medalList.getMethod: Reach Player Level 50
medalList.description: Your decent performance has given you a good reputation.

medalList.getMethod: Reach Player Level 100
medalList.description:
Your growth and improvement reflects well upon your reputation.
One success is the starting point of your next success.

medalList.getMethod: Reach Player Level 120
medalList.description:
Your reputation makes you stand out from the crowd.
Never stop growing, never stop exploring, never stop moving forward.

medalList.getMethod: Obtained 100 days after waking up
medalList.description:
An engraved medal issued to commemorate the 100th day since your awakening.
Since the first day of your hundred days, you've never stopped fighting for us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtained 365 days after waking up
medalList.description:
An engraved medal issued to commemorate a full year of service.
The seasons change, but your mission has not changed, and your battles will continue.

medalList.getMethod: Obtained 730 days after waking up
medalList.description:
An engraved medal issued to commemorate the 730th day since your awakening.
You have at last a moment of reprieve, but you know that a new battle is about to begin.

medalList.getMethod: Obtained 1095 days after waking up.
medalList.description:
A trimmed medal issued to commemorate the 1095th day since your awakening.
For three years, you have carefully pondered the many challenges that faced Rhodes Island. You realized that beyond all those conundrums lay a brand new future.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 30 unique Operators
medalList.description: You've met some Operators for the first time.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 60 unique Operators
medalList.description:
You've developed a mutual understanding with quite a few Operators.
The growing group of Operators is sure to pose new challenges, but the benefit to Rhodes Island will be much greater in time.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 90 unique Operators
medalList.description:
You've brought together many Operators under the same banner.
Maintaining interpersonal relationships between such a large number of Operators requires immense dedication.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 130 unique Operators
medalList.description:
You've touched the hearts and minds of countless Operators, developing trusting relationships.
The Crown cannot win a war, and reins are unable to steer an army. What you need is not a scepter, but rather sincerity.

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 160 unique Operators
medalList.description:
'You are attempting to build your own network of operators.
Columbia has already developed effective personnel management programs, but you still insist on sticking to the tried-and-true methods of meet-and-greet.'

medalList.getMethod: Hire a total of 200 unique Operators
medalList.description:
Your operator network is expanding. 
Your operators wonder just how vast a network of relationships your energy and intellect can maintain.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 30 times
medalList.description: Your first time on the job.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 100 times
medalList.description: You've developed your method of recruiting.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 300 times
medalList.description:
You've developed a keen eye for talent.
By starting with developing strong relationships, you've paved the way for many more people to become Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 500 times
medalList.description:
Your ideas flow like a river.
The channels where intelligence and information flow are often rich beds of talent, many of whom possess the potential to become Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 1000 times
medalList.description:
The search for talent is of paramount importance to you.
Whereas other people find but sand in the desert, you will uncover secrets, wealth, and even new Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 1500 times
medalList.description:
You allow talent to thrive.
Through the headhunting services' intelligence reserves, you've set your eyes on many potential operators.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 2000 times
medalList.description:
You cast a cursory glance at the resumes. 
Headhunters are still providing talent, but you've already set your sights abroad.

medalList.getMethod: Conduct Recruitment 2500 times
medalList.description:
Your recruiting work has been exemplary.
On your desk are piles upon piles of resumes, but one must be careful when choosing the right help. From the beginning to the end, you will follow through on your own principles.

The flame known as the Reunion has been extinguished, though some may hide the lingering embers within their palms.
The unspeakable story will eventually fade, but they will continue to devote themselves to it with no fear of sacrifice.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 3-8
medalList.description: You've witnessed a series of tragedies.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages from the Prologue to Episode 3 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You've fought off the enemies under excruciating conditions.
It seems you make a good team with the Rhodes Island squad.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 4-10
medalList.description: Your squad has survived a battle against FrostNova.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 4 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You've become an expert of challenges.
Your operatives can now carry out your instructions with exact precision.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 5-10
medalList.description: Rhodes Island and the L.G.D. have successfully fended off a crisis.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 5 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to carry out missions in sprawling cities.
You are skilled in creating advantages and adapting to your surroundings.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 5 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
Fortunately, you've escaped unscathed.
The arrows of Inferno just barely missed you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 6-7
medalList.description: Your operators have retrieved Faust's crossbow.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 6-17
medalList.description: You've become friends with FrostNova.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 6 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to carry out missions in the freezing cold.
Desperate straits are an opportunity, and you are not one to let an opportunity slip by.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 6 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
You haven't become an ice sculpture.
The icy feats of Cocytus are now evaporating away.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 7-2
medalList.description: Ch'en Hui-chieh has chosen her own path.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 7-18
medalList.description: News of Patriot's death echoed throughout Chernobog Core City.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 7 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to carry out assaults during stealthy infiltrations.
As long as you remain unseen by the enemy's mainstay, all methods are fair game.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 7 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
Congratulations, you haven't been crushed into pieces.
The Starfire-like halberd has merely smashed into the ground.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage R8-11
medalList.description: The Emperors' Blades have splintered Talulah's Infected faction.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage M8-8
medalList.description: You've dealt with the Class II Infection Threat at the sarcophagus with Kal'tsit, and that took you on a trip down memory lane.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage JT8-3
medalList.description: The Chernobog Incident has been successfully resolved. Give yourself a pat on the back.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 8 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You now possess the ability to see your objectives through in a battlefield of everchanging circumstances.
Perhaps the enemy is the side that was overwhelmed in your eyes?

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 8 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
There remains a tiny trace of warmth on your sleeve.
The Draco's flames consumed all in its path, yet you remain unscathed.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 9-12
medalList.description: On the chaotic battlefield, any camp may well be your enemy.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Stage 9-19
medalList.description: A ray of light breaks free from the clouds pressing down on the city.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in Episode 9 on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You've proven your ability to lead operations inside the burning city. 
Self-preservation is just as important as fighting the enemy.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 9 with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
The storm approaches, but you stay your course. 
Even the stone pillars strewn by chaotic winds cannot knock you down.

medalList.getMethod: Clear Stage 10-11 in any Environment with a 3-star rating.
medalList.description: You saw how much faith the soldiers had in their respective commanders.

medalList.getMethod: Clear Stage 10-17 in any Environment with a 3-star rating.
medalList.description: You rode the blazing train into the center of the storm.

medalList.getMethod: Clear all non-Extreme Mode stages in Episode 10 in Adverse Environment with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You've proven your ability to carry out operations under large scale cannon fire.
The cannon cares not for the lives of the innocent.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 10 with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
Yes, General. The cannon is aimed at the target.
The only thing melted apart was the city's last sanctum.

medalList.getMethod: Clear Stage 11-12 in any Environment with a 3-star rating.
medalList.description: You have seen Victoria's honor and splendor, here in eternal rest.

medalList.medalName: 'A Sigh from the Dawn of Time'
medalList.getMethod: Clear Stage 11-20 in any Environment with a 3-star rating.
medalList.description: You are about to face war head-on. What can you use to quell this hatred born of fiery rage, when it has already boiled over?

medalList.getMethod: Clear all non-Extreme Mode stages in Episode 11 in Adverse Environment with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You possess the ability to conduct combat in contaminated environments.
Death draws a luxurious peace from the eyes of the living.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Extreme Mode stages in Episode 11 with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You have not been eroded by corruption.
But war cannot be averted. Being eaten away by despair is the last faint hope the inhabitants even have.

medalList.getMethod: Clear the following Supplies stages: LS-5, CA-5, CE-5, SK-5, and AP-5.
medalList.description: You are familiar with the preparation processes of a variety of materials.

medalList.getMethod: Clear the following Chips stages: PR-A-2, PR-B-2, PR-C-2, and PR-D-2.
medalList.description: You are familiar with how to acquire a variety of chips.

medalList.getMethod: Reach weekly reward limit 1800
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully honing your skills during the Annihilation period.
You have proved that a high intensity, prolonged command only makes you all the stronger.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Chernobog and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Chernobog Annihilation mission.
Chernobog's refugees are now being escorted out of the city by Rhodes Island.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Lungmen Outskirts and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Lungmen Outskirts Annihilation mission.
Lungmen's citizens now recognize Rhodes Island's professionalism and trustworthiness.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Lungmen Downtown and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Lungmen Downtown Annihilation mission.
Lungmen's citizens now hold Rhodes Island in high esteem.

medalList.medalName: The Grand Knight Territory Outskirts Action Medal
medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation The Grand Knight Territory Outskirts and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Grand Knight Territory Outskirts Annihilation mission or practice.
No matter how the mission was completed, Rhodes Island is now highly appraised in the Kazimierz merchants' eyes.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Frozen Abandoned City and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Frozen Abandoned City Annihilation mission or practice.
Be it training or actual combat, this land of death will never engulf all that walks upon it.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Abandoned Mine and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Ursus Abandoned Mine Annihilation mission or simulation.
No matter whether simulated or put into practice, the departed souls once trapped in those mines will rest in peace.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Flooded Seashore and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal commemorating your completion of the Siesta Flooded Seashore Annihilation Mission or its practice battle.
The seafront should be reserved for tourists, not soldiers.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Watery Tidehollow and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Iberian Watery Tidehollow Annihilation Mission or its practice battle.
Should the Seaborn make it ashore, will life on land survive?

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Long Spring Wastes and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Long Spring Wastes Annihilation mission or its practice battle.
Evil should forever be buried beneath the golden sands.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Dossoles Water Gate and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Dossoles Water Gate Annihilation Mission or its practice battle. 
The equipment 'imported' from Leithanien is very practical. Mayor Candela is quite pleased.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation South Prison and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal representing your completion of the Columbia South Prison Annihilation Mission or its practice battle. 
Jesselton's attempted jailbreak fails again.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation County Hillock Countryside and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal representing your completion of the County Hillock Countryside Annihilation Mission or its practice battle.
The repercussions of the County Hillock incident haven't expanded further out, at least on the surface.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Night Champion Show and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Kazimierz Night Champion Show Annihilation mission or its practice battle.
Times are a-changing, and so is what the knighthood stands for.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Lingering Shangshu Trails and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal representing your completion of the Lingering Shangshu Trails Annihilation Mission or its practice battle. 
An old friend meanders along the mountain paths, ruminating on the spirits of all things.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Chocolate Street and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Laterano Chocolate Street Annihilation Mission or its Practice battle.
Faith made them lose their way, then helped them find it again. Are they seeking faith, or their own true heart?

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Penumbra Shipyards and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Penumbra Shipyards Annihilation Mission or its practice battle.
Gold does not tarnish, it simply garners dust by the day.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Research Base Hanger and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for successfully completing the Columbian Research Base Hanger Annihilation mission or its practice battle.
The rainfall comes to a stop, and the silver river gradually dries up, leaving only the winds of the future blowing toward the past.

medalList.getMethod: Completely clear Annihilation Operation Lungmen Commercial District and claim all the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal representing your completion of Yan's Lungmen Commercial District Annihilation Mission or its practice battle.
Gather your crew, and make your point known subtly.

medalList.medalName: Iron Carrot City Safety Certification Medal
medalList.getMethod: Complete [Iron Carrot Mine]
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded by the client after successfully completing the Iron Carrot Mine Security Mission. 
With Rhodes Island's hard work, the mine has finally resumed operation.

medalList.getMethod: Complete [Toron Mine]
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded by the client after successfully completing the Toron Mine Security Mission. 
With Rhodes Island's hard work, the mine has finally resumed operation.

medalList.getMethod: Complete [Glebe Mining Platform]
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded by the client after successfully completing the Glebe Mining Platform Security Mission.
With Rhodes Island's hard work, the mining platform has finally resumed operation.

medalList.getMethod: Complete [SÅ‚oma Processing Platform]
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded by the client after successfully completing the SÅ‚oma Foods Processing Platform Security Mission.
With Rhodes Island's hard work, cleanup work on the processing platform has finally concluded.

medalList.getMethod: Complete [Under-Construction Dossoles Plate].
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded by the client after successfully completing the Under-Construction Dossoles Plate Security Mission.
With Rhodes Island's hard work, the plate has finally returned to its original course.

medalList.getMethod: Complete [Under-Construction Dossoles Plate] Emergency Supply mode.
medalList.description:
A special medal awarded by the client after completing the Under-Construction Dossoles Plate Security Mission under Emergency Resupply Conditions.
Under your brilliant command, the plate has returned to its original course at the lowest possible cost.

medalList.getMethod: Complete [Acahuallan Jungle].
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded by the client after successfully completing the Acahuallan Jungle Security Mission.
With Rhodes Island's hard work, the original state of the area's flora has been restored.

medalList.getMethod: Complete [Acahuallan Jungle] Emergency Supply mode.
medalList.description:
A special medal awarded by the client after completing the Acahuallan Jungle Security Mission under Emergency Resupply Conditions.
Under your brilliant command, the original state of the area's flora has been restored at the lowest possible cost.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description: Under your guidance, one of your Operators has passed the Promotion Qualification Exam.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 20 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description: Several of your Operators have passed the Promotion Qualification Exam.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 50 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description: The Promotion Qualification Exam has gradually turned into just another way for your Operators to gauge their personal growth.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 80 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description:
The Promotion Qualification Exam is no more than a basic test for your Operators to improve themselves.
After being promoted, will they continue to strive for greater heights?

medalList.getMethod: Raise 100 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description: The Logistics Department is currently considering including the promotion qualification exam in the training process.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 150 Operator(s) to Elite 1
medalList.description:
The Logistics Department has added the promotion qualification exam to the training process.
The promotion process will greatly improve our Operators' combat prowess.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description: Under your leadership, an Operator has discovered their unique value to the team.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 10 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description: Several of your Operators have taken on important roles within their respective posts.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 25 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description: Many of your Operators have gone above and beyond the call of duty.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 40 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description:
A few of your Operators have become role models within their fields.
Rhodes Island constantly seeks to expand its talent pool. If there's a position you can't fill, you sometimes have to cultivate that talent yourself.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 50 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description: Many operators have already become benchmark figures in their respective fields.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 100 Operator(s) to Elite 2
medalList.description:
Many of your operators have become exemplars in their respective fields. 
Those who attain mastery will pass their knowledge on to newcomers, thus greatly increasing Rhodes Island's talent pool across various areas.

medalList.getMethod: Train 1 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description: One of your Operators has mastered their techniques upon the battlefield.

medalList.getMethod: Train 25 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description: After mastering their individual abilities, your Operators seek to develop synergies.

medalList.getMethod: Train 60 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description:
Your Operators are exploring the possibility of effective joint operations.
Combined-squad operations not only test the capabilities of the commander, but also test the ability of Operators to work together - the effective use of their skills only first step towards enabling that.

medalList.getMethod: Train 75 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description: A large number of operators under your command are already trying to cooperatively synergize their skills.

medalList.getMethod: Train 100 Operator(s) to Skill Level 7
medalList.description:
The operators under your command are developing general guidelines for how to use their skills on the battlefield. 
Armed with a large pool of skilled operators, Rhodes Island's commanders can develop comprehensive and detailed protocols for the usage of skills.

medalList.getMethod: Train 1 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description: One of your Operators has honed their combat skills to perfection.

medalList.getMethod: Train 5 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description: Several of your Operators have fully developed their skills on the battlefield.

medalList.getMethod: Train 10 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description:
Many of your Operators have fully grasped how to leverage their position on the battlefield.
While tempering oneself is no easy feat, learning to work towards a common goal with others can be more difficult.

medalList.getMethod: Train 15 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description: Many of your operators have fully understood their roles on the battlefield.

medalList.getMethod: Train 30 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description:
Many of your operators have fully grasped their positions on the battlefield. 
Having strong reserves is reassuring indeed.

medalList.getMethod: Train 60 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description:
A good deal of your Operators have fully grasped their roles on the battlefield.
Benefiting from the variety of individual talents your Operators possess, you are able to adapt to the changing demands of combat.

medalList.getMethod: Train 100 Operator(s) to Skill Specialization 3
medalList.description:
A large number of your Operators have fully grasped their roles on the battlefield.
After their individual abilities have been systemically categorized, many of your tactical deployment ideas will soon be achievable.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operators to Trust 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with one of your Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 20 Operators to Trust 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with several of your Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 50 Operators to Trust 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with many of your Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 100 Operators to Trust 100
medalList.description:
You have become good friends with a significant amount of your Operators.
Someone is bound to say hi and make conversation every time you walk down the hallway.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 150 Operators to Trust 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with a great many of your Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 200 Operators to Trust 100
medalList.description: You have become good friends with an impressive number of Operators.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 1 Operators to Trust 200
medalList.description: One of your Operators is now willing to trust you with their life.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 20 Operators to Trust 200
medalList.description: Several of your Operators are now willing to trust you with their lives.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 40 Operators to Trust 200
medalList.description: Many of your Operators are now willing to trust you with their lives.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 60 Operators to Trust 200
medalList.description:
A significant number of your Operators are now willing to trust you with their lives. 
How in the world are you able to keep such close relationships with so many operators?

medalList.getMethod: Raise 100 Operators to Trust 200
medalList.description:
You've met many friends whose lives are now intertwined with yours. 
You are worthy of these deep relationships.

medalList.getMethod: Raise 150 Operators to Trust 200
medalList.description:
You've met many friends whose lives are now intertwined with yours. 
You are worthy of these deep relationships.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Courier, Gavial, and Dur-nar
medalList.description: Your willingness to help others is a major reason why many Operators have joined us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Courier, Gavial, and Dur-nar, and raise them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You have gained the recognition of messengers, combat medics, and instructors.
You all share the same view, that trust is indispensable.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Ethan and Breeze
medalList.description: Your hard work and dedication is a reason why many Operators have joined us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Ethan and Breeze, and raise them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You have gained the recognition of a master of stealth and a declining physician.
You all share the same view, that hard work will inevitably pay off.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Lancet-2 and Castle-3
medalList.description: Some of Closure's robots have already been dispatched to your side.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Lancet-2 and Castle-3, and get them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You've gained the approval of Guard and Medic Robots.
If not for their lack of a carbon-based body, they're really just like us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Honeyberry and Pudding
medalList.description: Your patience and kindness is a major reason why many Operators have joined us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Honeyberry and Pudding, and raise them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You have earned the approval of electrical engineers and herbalists.
A little afternoon break can be very relaxing on busy days.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Qanipalaat and Quartz
medalList.description: Your unyielding will is a major reason why many Operators have joined us.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Qanipalaat and Quartz, and raise them to Max Potential
medalList.description:
You have earned the approval of roaming mercenaries and tundra rescuers.
Thunder may crack and the storm may rage, but a strong will never dies.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock 12F's Operator Record 'Certain Choices'
medalList.description:
A person's identity begins and ends with their name.
How are our identities, our beginnings, and our ends defined?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Kroos's Operator Record 'Apples'
medalList.description:
A kind of food and also the marksmen's favorite target.
If you ever find Kroos's toy arrows stuck anywhere that's not an apple, that's because she never intended to shoot the apple in the first place.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Rope's Operator Record 'Floral Perfume'
medalList.description:
A fragrance neither luxuriant nor special; just perfect for a girl who grew up on the streets of Lungmen.
Rope holds this perfume dear to her heart. It was something she could only ever look at through the shops' windows, and now she has one specially made for her.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Shirayuki's Operator Record 'The Way of Shinobi'
medalList.description:
The way of the shinobi is a strange, poorly traveled road.
As Chief Engineer Closure can attest, having Shirayuki inspect pipes is perhaps a fine decision indeed.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Broca's Operator Record 'The First Step Towards Trust'
medalList.description:
There exists no organizations that we can come to like at first glance.
All we can do is to convince everyone through our actions that our ideals are far from empty promises.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Provence's Operator Record 'Coworkers'
medalList.description:
While you are worried about others, there are bound to be others who are concerned about you.
Thanks to Tsukinogi's thoughtful advice, our Medical operators stand ready to keep Provence from sneaking out through the landship's entrance.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Firewatch's Operator Record 'On My Way'
medalList.description:
Firewatch believes the future holds naught but a path of revenge.
Perhaps it was a pitstop, or perhaps it was a detour, but, by chance, she came upon Rhodes Island.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ceobe's Operator Record 'XXL Honey Biscuit'
medalList.description:
An engraved medal handcrafted by Vulcan. Modeled after a honey biscuit, these medals are given to Ceobe as a reward for her performance.
Though Ceobe is particularly fond of these medals, they are actually the same size as all other medals; the only difference being the letters 'XXL' emblazoned on them.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Eyjafjalla's Operator Record 'Heart of a Scholar'
medalList.description:
The heart of a scholar is an abstract concept. It is something that cannot be quantified, and can only be conceptualized in our hearts.
Be careful not to let mere representations cloud your judgment.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Eyjafjalla's Operator Record 'Volcano'
medalList.description:
There is a volcano is Eyjafjalla's mind.
That once burned away is truth, and eternity.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Phantom's Operator Record 'Cooperation'
medalList.description:
There is much that we cannot accomplish alone. Therefore, we must work together.
It is part of a Rhodes Island operator's required studies to learn how to work with our many peculiar teammates to bring our missions to a successful conclusion.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Lancet-2's Operator Record 'A Piece of Graffiti'
medalList.description:
It is said to be a piece of Columbian slang. 
Lancet-2 is not certain about whether she is fond of it since she is a robot, yet she appreciate its prettiness.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Melantha's Operator Record 'Team Captain'
medalList.description:
The formation of Reserve Op team A4 is not without twists and turns. 
The instructor believes that Melantha will become a good captain. But what does it take to become one?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Lava's Operator Record ''Sisters''
medalList.description:
This isn't something you can just give to other people!
Even if Lava won't acknowledge it, nobody's ever doubted that the sisters truly do get along well.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Lava's Operator Record ''Caring''
medalList.description:
Hibiscus is sick?!
This would be Hibiscus's first time ill, and Lava's first time tending to her big sister... right?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Vigna's Operator Record 'What You've Gotta Do'
medalList.description:
For Vigna, rock 'n' roll is her whole hobby.
But it's not her whole life.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Gitano's Operator Record ''Divination''
medalList.description:
Everything has a price, and no price is ever the same.
Divination is much the same: pay their terms, obtain your results.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mayer's Operator Record 'One Packed Daily Schedule'
medalList.description:
Mayer always works around the clock.
Of course, she asked for that herself, since she likes it.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Warfarin's Operator Record ''Monster''
medalList.description:
Warfarin never hides that she's a Vampire.
No need to panic, and no use for fear.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Angelina's Operator Record ''Package with No Recipient''
medalList.description:
A work slip-up?
Angelina sure doesn't feel like anyone here would send her a present.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ethan's Operator Record ''Old Friends in Foreign Places''
medalList.description: 'I've got a friend. We haven't met in so long. I only know everything worked out fine for him after.'

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Perfumer's Operator Record ''Refurbishment Plans''
medalList.description:
The Convalescent Garden needs a refresh to keep up with the times.
To this end, there's a great deal Perfumer needs to do, just like when she first established the Garden.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Liskarm's Operator Record ''Apple Pie Party, Now Preparing!''
medalList.description: 'You guys can cook. I've still got a bill I need to settle.'

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Liskarm's Operator Record ''Still Waiting''
medalList.description:
Reality isn't as fine as it is in novels.
That said, the longing and fantasy of it will pave the road for realists. Just keep waiting for her.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Schwarz's Operator Record ''The Day We Left Home''
medalList.description:
In the past, Schwarz's life was always very simple.
But now, things have gotten complicated.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Noir Corne's Operator Record 'The Other Side of the Deck'
medalList.description:
Get off work earlier, kick back and relax.
At the bar, you may expose yourself to some new perspectives you've previously overlooked.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Indra's Operator Record 'The Guide to Mutual Learning'
medalList.description:
Tailored for Operator Indra.
The purpose of this is not to teach her to knock down her opponents faster, but to teach her to help them back up after knocking them down.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Sideroca's Operator Record 'Diligent'
medalList.description:
Nobody has the resolve to tell Sideroca that her intense focus can be rather troublesome.
So, everyone's always trying to divert her attention towards somebody else.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Exusiai's Operator Record 'Incoming Mail'
medalList.description:
A letter from one's hometown.
When traveling afar, is there anybody who doesn't get homesick at all?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Haze's Operator Record ''Kitties''
medalList.description: The 'Kitty Fanciers' Association' is now recruiting. Prospective applicants should report to Operator Haze.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Specter's Operator Record 'Merry Christmas!'
medalList.description: A precious music box. Its mysterious melody exudes elegance.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Texas's Operator Record 'Guaranteed Success'
medalList.description:
You can't go wrong with Texas's expedited delivery service.
If there is an issue, it's definitely something on the recipient's side.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Hellagur's Operator Record 'Fate'
medalList.description:
The general is distancing himself from the land he once believed in.
Beneath the burning sky, he leaves behind his arrogance, his glory, and his entire past.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock THRM-EX's Operator Record 'Scorching-Hot Assault!'
medalList.description:
There's no such thing as hottest! We can only go hotter!
Are you ready to bear the heat of Thermal-EX's love? Recommended to prepare insulation materials in advance.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Earthspirit's Operator Record 'Extra Work'
medalList.description: She can plan out the extra work accordingly, so there is no need to stay up all night.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Savage's Operator Record 'Painful Reversal'
medalList.description: The Iron Carrot City Honorary Citizen Medal is awarded to people from all walks of life who have made outstanding contributions to the development of Iron Carrot City.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Savage's Operator Record 'No Less Than a Pie'
medalList.description:
Delicious, right? All of Savage's dishes are prepared with the full flavor of Rim Billiton's hospitality.
Incorporated within is friendliness, sweetness, and sincere blessings.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Nightingale's Operator Record 'A Song and a Blue Feather'
medalList.description:
A single blue plume shimmering in the night, an ephemeral but touching song.
These are not things that any regular person can discover. 'tis a small secret between you and Nightingale.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mountain's Operator Record 'Unexpected Annoyance'
medalList.description: For Mountain, formalwear is not only a symbol of his past status, but also a form of recollection, and a little warning.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Popukar's Operator Record 'Funtime'
medalList.description:
Kids always have a buncha secrets.
Some don't matter, but others can really give grown-ups a big headache.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Meteor's Operator Record 'Scalding Old Memories'
medalList.description: On a wrinkled sheet of paper, the handwriting of a young, immature child recounts a heartwarming fairytale.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Breeze's Operator Record 'Breeze's Warmth, Chilled Forest'
medalList.description: Breeze has received many a medal like this, as a doctor, and she treasures each one in a pouch she carries around.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mostima's Operator Record 'Atop the Skyscrapers'
medalList.description: She does not care, but that does not mean she has forgotten.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Durin's Operator Record 'Lunchtime Nap'
medalList.description:
More than anything, Durin enjoys the moments of rest she gets after meals.
Nothing compares to a good meal and a good sleep.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Dur-nar's Operator Record 'Extra Training'
medalList.description:
Dur-nar's goal is to ensure her students will survive.
It's time to break a sweat, because it's far too late when you find yourself bleeding.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Dur-nar's Operator Record 'A Glass with Old Stories'
medalList.description:
Evenings are best spent with old friends, yet there is one thing to bear in mind.
Most don't heed this advice, but it must still be saidâ€”don't open old wounds.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Gravel's Operator Record 'Past in Dreams'
medalList.description:
Some have told her that honor is intangible.
Others have told her that she must never betray the honor she carries.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Blaze's Operator Record 'Will You?'
medalList.description:
Rhodes Island's elite operators have all asked themselves this question:
Do you truly understand what it is that you fight for?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ch'en the Holungday's Operator Record 'Belonging'
medalList.description:
Coffee from Dossoles has a richer texture than your everyday brands.
Back when she was still at the Royal Guard Academy, Ch'en would sometimes brew herself a cup.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ch'en the Holungday's Operator Record 'Pathways'
medalList.description:
It is only by repeatedly tempering an ideal in real life that we can know whether its substance is sincere or hollow.
Ch'en still has a long way to go, but at least she is making her way there.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Fang's Operator Record 'Second Charge'
medalList.description:
Fang meticulously saves her reports after each and every mission.
To her, these are not merely written records of what she has done. They are proof of the trials and tribulations that she has overcome with her friends.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Specter's Operator Record 'I, Namely I'
medalList.description: The pocket watch, the very thing that proves who 'Specter' is, has always been in her hands.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Sussurro's Operator Record 'Professional Doctor'
medalList.description: If Sussurro had a medal for every patient she treated, then the walls of her bedroom would be papered with them.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Gladiia's Operator Record 'Dehydration'
medalList.description:
The dry air on land takes a lot more time to get used to than battles on land.
Besides, Gladiia is actively resistant to change.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Tomimi's Operator Record 'Brand New Life'
medalList.description:
Inspired by a friend's suggestion, Tomimi forged an emblem for her dorm's exhibition room.
She designed it all by herself after a bit of research, and not even Gavial has seen it yet.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Shaw's Operator Record 'Careful of Flammables'
medalList.description:
Shaw has received many honors and medals in the past. One of these medals was personally awarded to her by Lungmen's chief executive.
These shiny medals are what encourages the fireman to always remain as determined as she was when she started out.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Cardigan's Operator Record 'It'll Be Fine, Guaranteed!'
medalList.description:
A beat up snowboard that can't be used anymore.
Nevertheless, it's been deeply treasured and cared for because of the help it provided to some important friends.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Bagpipe's Operator Record 'Dangerous Road'
medalList.description:
A road map that has been thoroughly marked. 
From County Hillock of Victoria to Londinium, across Leithanien and Siracusa. And finally, towards Lungmen.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Sora's Operator Record 'Distance'
medalList.description:
A letter that has been unfolded and refolded countless times. 
Sora reads each fan letter painstakingly penned to her, over and over again.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Catapult's Operator Record 'Break Free'
medalList.description:
A memento of Catapult's departure from her hometown. 
She scattered jewels and gold baubles along the way, taking nothing with her except her free and easygoing manner.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Catapult's Operator Record 'Change'
medalList.description:
The only proof of Catapult returning to her hometown. 
With the exception of the people who had left, everything had changed, yet nothing had changed.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Midnight's Operator Record 'Letter From Home'
medalList.description:
A letter from Higashi. 
Midnight has opened this many times, but this time, he finally knows how to pick up the pen.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Nearl the Radiant Knight's Operator Record 'Starting Point'
medalList.description:
The Radiant Knight penned a strategic manual which she named 'Starting Point.' 
Though paperwork can hardly be considered her forte, she's determined to start learning from scratch.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Platinum's Operator Record 'Bubbles'
medalList.description:
It floated in the sky, glowing iridescent; and with a 'pop,' it disappeared without a trace. 
For better or for worse, you still remember how it glowed in mid-air.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ptilopsis's Operator Record 'Deep, Dark Dream'
medalList.description:
Rhodes Island Operator Ptilopsis, Rhine Lab Data Keeper Joyce Moore. 
She has hidden her past, a tragedy shrouded in mist.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Gummy's Operator Record 'Lost Companion'
medalList.description:
A videotape full of memories. 
One day, Gummy will offer it up with her own two hands.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Gummy's Operator Record 'Growing Up'
medalList.description:
Gummy packed her bags and prepared to set out. 
The little bear held her companion's hand, enjoying a rare night of sleep.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Blemishine's Operator Record 'Ready to Serve'
medalList.description:
Blemishine wants to understand what kinds of roads her sister has traveled, to see what she has seen. 
But before that, she has to figure out where she is about to head.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Manticore's Operator Record 'Dead Silence'
medalList.description:
A combat exercise plan with a small note attached that doesn't fit the format of a formal application. 
The handwriting is slightly crooked, and the paper has been punctured in several places. You know this isn't how she normally writes.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Meteor's Operator Record 'Dilemma'
medalList.description: A seed from a rare tree. Given the right environment, it may be able to germinate.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Vanilla's Operator Record 'Originium Slugs and Hops'
medalList.description: No matter how cruel the battlefield is, Vanilla has always retained her gentle heart. This ordinary girl has no grand ideals to speak of, but one sentence has left a profound impression within her: 'Only by cherishing every nameless blade of grass can we embrace the entire grassland.'

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Castle-3's Operator Record 'Immortal'
medalList.description:
A song played over and over again on an old record player. 
Castle-3 learned to simulate the melody with electric sounds, and 'contemplates' its entire existence within the melody.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock SilverAsh's Operator Record 'Unpredictable'
medalList.description:
Will two similar people become friends, or foes? 
Perhaps only time will tell.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock SilverAsh's Operator Record 'Unbreakable Ice'
medalList.description: For some people, anyone met even once might be considered a friend. But others may find only one or two in a lifetime.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Pramanix's Operator Record 'Beyond the Snowy Mountain'
medalList.description:
A veritable tome that has been returned to your desk. Despite its size, you know she's read it carefully. 
Cliffheart once said that before her sister became the Saintess, she loved reading fantasy novels and poetry anthologies.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Cliffheart's Operator Record 'Heart of the Cliffs'
medalList.description:
A chunk of crystal-clear ore that barely fits in one hand. In addition to its medicinal properties, several Columbian collectors have been paying handsome sums for this ore. 
According to an Kjerag-born operator, it used to be inexpensive despite its rarity.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Matterhorn's Operator Record 'One Day'
medalList.description:
The tastes from those distant memories are nigh-impossible to reproduce. 
The ingredients haven't changed, only the tongue.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mizuki's Operator Record 'The Fifth Contact'
medalList.description:
You try to send him a token of your friendliness, but that is obviously not the rational choice. 
This may either prove the cornerstone of a magnificent bridge of camaraderie, or the key to the unmaking of civilization. Or, it might just be yet another trifling matter between the two of you.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Istina's Operator Record 'Let's Go, Let's Go'
medalList.description:
Sweets. Lots of sweets. An entire assortment of sweets. Familiar shapes. Familiar aromas. The familiar sweetness fills her mouth, but the aftertaste quickly turns bitter. 
Then, with all her might, she pivots her body around, turns her back on all those memories, and moves on with her life.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Plume's Operator Record 'A Grand, Distant Ideal'
medalList.description:
Some spare weapon parts that had already been swapped out. Plume will neatly arrange them in a certain compartment of her box. 
Unlabeled, just like everything else in her storage.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Provence's Operator Record 'A Perilous Road'
medalList.description:
A soft ball of fluff from the fur of her tail, and a few yellow rocks she specifically collected. 
Provence will remember the significance of these items.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Nian's Operator Record 'A Thousand Years in a Sigh'
medalList.description: The past is ephemeral. Occasionally, when reflecting back, the evening sun still blinds the eyes.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ling's Operator Record 'From a Long Dream Woken'
medalList.description:
A few jugs of Husong wine. Jiangnan's is weak, Saibei's is strong, and Shangshu's lingers in the stomach. 
Everywhere she goes, she must seek out fine wine. She lifts her cup to the sun and offers poetry to the moon.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock FEater's Operator Record 'Nosedive'
medalList.description: The deep mountains and ancient rocks are endless, but new and strong shoots take root.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Swire's Operator Record 'Day Before the Job'
medalList.description:
A piece of insignificant bygonesâ€”formerly a child's deep suffering, now reduced to a few jokes. Used to start conversations and draw people closer, proving the will and personality it was born with. 
The summit still towers overhead, but the tiger cub has already left the shadows of the past.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ch'en's Operator Record 'In One Effort'
medalList.description: Endless effort isn't to be feared. What's terrifying is gaining nothing in return.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mr. Nothing's Operator Record 'Drowning'
medalList.description:
A small silk brocade bag, stuffed with candied plums, a specialty of Mr. Nothing's hometown.
It's a shame, but the bag fell straight into some water along the way, and the plums inside have lost their flavor. Heaven knows how long it'll be until he can buy the right kind again.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Jaye's Operator Record 'Roll With Your Mistakes'
medalList.description: A seafood hawker can do his part for Lungmen's order too.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Shaw's Operator Record 'Flammables'
medalList.description: What's already happened becomes Shaw's motivation, not her burden. She's forever readying to prevent another tragedy from taking place.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Fiammetta's Operator Record 'Paradisus'
medalList.description:
To grow is to understand just how much choice you really have.
Some people choose to enjoy life, while others merely go through it.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Franka's Operator Record 'Symbols of the Past'
medalList.description: A sword move, a letter, a piece of the past. The dead are goneâ€”it's time to begin a new life.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Myrrh's Operator Record 'Lucky Charm'
medalList.description: Those gone far away will meet us again one day, guided by the spirits of the flora.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Scavenger's Operator Record 'The Will of a Coin'
medalList.description:
To a nobody on their own, a life is worth just about one silver coin.
More often than not, it's just pulled out on a whim and lands as it will, but there are exceptions to the rule.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Exusiai's Operator Record 'Constants Within Changes'
medalList.description: Exusiai cherishes her life in Laterano, and likes her life in Lungmen. When change visits her again, she'll gladly take it, because she knows it's all her own choice, and she trusts her choices.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Waai Fu's Operator Record 'What Martial Arts Serve'
medalList.description: Some say 'martial arts halt wars,' while others say kung fu is past its expiration date. After going through quite the gauntlet, Waai Fu has her own answers for what it means to practice the martial arts.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Scene's Operator Record 'Recorder'
medalList.description: Sometimes, the stories behind photographs deserve more attention than the pictures themselves.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Jessica's Operator Record 'The Slow Walk Ahead'
medalList.description:
These training records may not prove to her family that she can more than hold her own, but they do show that she is quickly improving.
The things that she gifts others might seem valuable, but what is truly priceless is the courage hidden deep within her.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ceylon's Operator Record 'Heartfelt Present'
medalList.description:
Her heart yearns to save others, and that is where her bottomless courage comes from.
She may sometimes seem a little unsociable, but nobody faults her for that.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Horn's Operator Record 'Solo'
medalList.description:
Having lost all her accompanists, the Tempest Platoon's warrior can only soldier on with her responsibilities alone.
Fortunately, there are those who hear her horn and heed her call.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Warfarin's Operator Record 'Rarely Serious'
medalList.description: After traveling on her own for centuries, she chose in the end to settle down at Rhodes Island. Through the flames of war, her train of thought leads her to Amiya.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Cutter's Operator Record 'Meals, Ready-to-Eat'
medalList.description: Bringing missions to a successful close isn't all there is anymore. Rather, it's to live with hope and become the person you want to be.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Specter the Unchained's Operator Record 'Selfhood'
medalList.description:
A newly carved stone emblem.
Get to know others once more, and get to know yourself once more.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Irene's Operator Record 'Lantern's Twilight'
medalList.description: No one will help her navigate this journey, but the light in her heart will forever illuminate the path forward.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Whisperain's Operator Record 'Before the Rain'
medalList.description:
She wants to see another movie.
Perhaps there will come a day when Rhodes Island's operators won't get to read Whisperain's movie reviews anymore, but not today.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Asbestos's Operator Record 'Strange Sights'
medalList.description: Every time she climbs back up again, she thinks to herself: that was worth it.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Perfumer's Operator Record 'How Old Trees Grow'
medalList.description: Life forever beats on, just as many beautiful things are lost to the rivers of time. Even so, thanks to all of Perfumer's work, many years later there will still be those who get to breathe in this fragrance.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Orchid's Operator Record 'Incomplete'
medalList.description: The things you do not finish pile up in your heart. They can't be uncovered, nor can they be cast aside.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ebenholz's Operator Record 'Lone Lamp'
medalList.description: He once performed for himself. Then, for his best friend. Now, he wants to perform for even more people.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Hibiscus the Purifier's Operator Record 'Nameless Flower'
medalList.description: Deep in the silent night, a nameless flower blooms in a deserted corner.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Earthspirit's Operator Record 'Distant Relic'
medalList.description: One of the items Professor Bachmann was unable to hand over to Earthspirit before his passing, engraved with her name. One who holds the medal and armband is able to enter the Scholar's Association he was part of and converse with other members. Beware, for curiosity heralds the beginning of ruin.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Hung's Operator Record 'South Wall'
medalList.description: One who once mixed their rice with tears will not add too much salt to their cooking.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Greyy's Operator Record 'Filter Stars'
medalList.description: The faint light filters away the darkness. At this moment, the stars mirror each other in their twinkling.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Skadi's Operator Record 'Endless Journey'
medalList.description: Go, Skadi. The farther, the better.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Aosta's Operator Record 'Future Woven'
medalList.description: This was a skill he only learned to make life easier. Now, his hands have crafted a doll seemingly as soft as the clouds. It is an accessory to be worn, a gift given to one another.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Toddifons's Operator Record 'Armor and Crossbow'
medalList.description: The armor and crossbow each exist to restrain the other. Perhaps their users harbor the same feelings.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Greyy the Lightningbearer's Operator Record 'Light, He Wrote'
medalList.description: His writings chronicle his progress. His brightness will last into the future forevermore.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Ifrit's Operator Record 'Team Captain'
medalList.description: How tall do you have to grow, before others will depend on you?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Silence's Operator Record 'New to the Workforce'
medalList.description: A dream becoming reality is by all rights wonderful, all the more so when reality doesn't reveal what lies behind the curtain.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Blue Poison's Operator Record 'Untouchable'
medalList.description: Untouchable, but still trying hard to reach out.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mayer's Operator Record 'Heart of Creation'
medalList.description: Years ago, it was just a mischievous clock. Now they are Meeboos. They are Mayer's friends.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Zima's Operator Record 'Strong Meets Stronger'
medalList.description: 'Big Sis' made it personally. The Engineering Department feels that she is very talented, as does Zima.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Estelle's Operator Record 'One Small Step For Her'
medalList.description: Flower crown hand-made by Lena, given to Estelle as witnessed by the Doctor. A small step forward, witnessed by only a few, but one that has brought a rare smile to her face.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Podenco's Operator Record 'Bloom Season'
medalList.description: The girl from BolÃ­var wanted to become an amazing florist. She became an amazing florist.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Gavial the Invincible's Operator Record 'In the Name of Alcohol!'
medalList.description: She is not exactly the best at dealing with this stuff, but she has her own way.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Thorns's Operator Record 'Anniversary'
medalList.description: We clasped each other's hands and called ourselves brothers. We will usher in a new era.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Flint's Operator Record 'Warrior's Due'
medalList.description: A proper Tiacauh warrior who hits hard and thinks quickly.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock April's Operator Record 'Hunter's Vision'
medalList.description: She gazes upon the beast, and the people gaze upon her.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Indigo's Operator Record 'Hardcore Drink'
medalList.description: A light-purple liquid with fresh and unique taste. The only downside is that it is not very suitable for drinking.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Pinecone's Operator Record 'Yours Sincerely'
medalList.description: The song in the letter connects the past to the present.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Magallan's Operator Record 'Cycle of Life'
medalList.description: Dreams sprout where you are not looking, blooming far and wide by the time you notice.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Vulcan's Operator Record 'Forging'
medalList.description: Hard steel in the hands, soft emotions in the heart.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Skyfire's Operator Record 'Old Classmate'
medalList.description: Some people are stuck in the past. Others keep moving forward.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Beehunter's Operator Record 'Ending Bell'
medalList.description: A boxer needs to do more than just keep standing.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Weedy's Operator Record 'Together Aboard'
medalList.description: She knows what she's meant to do, and where she'll go.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Aurora's Operator Record 'What She Saw'
medalList.description: She wants the spectacle of the sky, and more than that, she wants to witness the fruits of her own efforts upon this land.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mint's Operator Record 'Yesterday Once More'
medalList.description: Mint once made a promiseâ€”that in her research, she'd willingly brave all hazards.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Beanstalk's Operator Record 'The Wilds Do They Call'
medalList.description: The little Metal Crab guys think you're doing great!

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Croissant's Operator Record 'The Business'
medalList.description: You can't help but resemble a spinning top at times, busily going around and around, only to find when you stop that you're still where you started.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Kirara's Operator Record 'Secret Ending'
medalList.description: She triggered a secret ending without even trying, and then put that ending right back in its secret place.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Kirara's Operator Record 'No-Damage Clear'
medalList.description: If you only get one attempt, pull out all the stops and do your best.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Carnelian's Operator Record 'Protector's Nature'
medalList.description: The more protective, the more aggressive.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Bibeak's Operator Record 'Shell Break'
medalList.description: Commemoration of new birth.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Tuye's Operator Record 'Desert Rainbow'
medalList.description: What is stranger in an arid desert? A woman with an umbrella, or a rainbow across the sky?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Beeswax's Operator Record 'Trail of Sands'
medalList.description: Sometimes, what we have looked for all our life is not at the finish line, but at the starting line.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Honeyberry's Operator Record 'A Bitterest Rhizome'
medalList.description: From time to time, sweet fruits grow from astringent rhizomes. It's happenstance, the sort that's enough to be called lucky.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Windflit's Operator Record 'Lone Dance at the Old Factory'
medalList.description: Even the most tired can dance a darling dance here.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Rockrock's Operator Record 'Six Hundred Pounds'
medalList.description: At what point can a person's worth finally be weighed, in anything but money?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Totter's Operator Record 'A Plan'
medalList.description: Even with the most surefire stratagem, life can't be controlled.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Vigil's Operator Record 'Future Coming'
medalList.description: At the very least, he believes himself to be correct, here and now.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mountain's Operator Record 'Sinner's Path'
medalList.description: This path must be walked alone.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Wild Mane's Operator Record 'Aspiration'
medalList.description: What kind of self to aspire to?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Elysium's Operator Record 'Long Journey'
medalList.description: A brief respite from fatigue. Prepare, for the journey continues.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Meteorite's Operator Record 'Firefly's Light'
medalList.description: Fireflies descend upon the rare quiet evening.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Spot's Operator Record 'Face of the Hero'
medalList.description: A messily-scrawled 'Hero's Certificate,' but it means something.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Astesia's Operator Record 'Revelation'
medalList.description: May you shine as brightly as the stars in the sky.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Tequila's Operator Record 'Taste of Thorns'
medalList.description: Grasping the thorns means that the scent of the rose has not been forgotten.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Deepcolor's Operator Record 'Azure Memories'
medalList.description: That which came from the ocean does not necessarily return to it.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Roberta's Operator Record 'Elegy'
medalList.description: The elegy sings of the flames of life, and the flames of life burn for the singer.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Saileach's Operator Record 'A Pair of Fowlbeasts'
medalList.description: Fallen feathers eventually grow back. The days they take flight together again are distant no longer.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Harmonie's Operator Record 'Solitary Dancer'
medalList.description: What she likes are people and things that are useful to her. That's what she said. But sometimes, she dances alone.

medalList.medalName: 'The Great Detective's Case Files â€“ Volume I'
medalList.getMethod: Unlock May's Operator Record 'The Great Detective's Case Files - Volume I'
medalList.description: Each and every detective was a beginner once, and future great detectives are no exception. How will the clumsy Metis transform? Will our detective get a much-deserved reunion with the lady assistant? Stay tuned for the continuation!

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mousse's Operator Record 'Sweetheart'
medalList.description: No matter what happens, you're always my pride, Sweetheart.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Archetto's Operator Record 'Idol Promotion'
medalList.description: Beliefs cannot be used to trade, just as faith cannot be given a price.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Corroserum's Operator Record 'Corroserum's Badge'
medalList.description: A work badge provided by Rhodes Island with a badly damaged photo. Perhaps it wasn't taken properly care of.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Heavyrain's Operator Record 'Untimeliness'
medalList.description: Heavyrain is a kind girl, but that kindness might not be what she needs right now.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Bibeak's Operator Record 'Through the Long Hallway'
medalList.description: Bibeak heads through the long hallway and goes outside. It is a beautiful day. She looks at the clear skies and exhales.

medalList.medalName: 'Once Upon a Time, I Wandered Afar'
medalList.getMethod: Unlock Chongyue's Operator Record 'Once Upon a Time, I Wandered Afar'
medalList.description: Once upon a time, I journeyed afar with you by the side. Today, I look back on those times and wonder where you are.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Dusk's Operator Record 'Dawn and Dusk'
medalList.description: 'Two score years and some have come and gone like a dream, with this body yet in shock.'

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Aak's Operator Record 'A Night of Terror'
medalList.description: It is a lack of stability that leads to a lack of contentment.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Lee's Operator Record 'Three Square Meals a Day'
medalList.description: Fruits and vegetables, sauces and condiments, plates and bowls. Through all of these, you can see the passage of time.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Mulberry's Operator Record 'A Prayer for Peace'
medalList.description: A normal, slightly old-fashioned lucky charm. The simplest blessings are also the weightiest expectations.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Blacknight's Operator Record 'Souls of the Wilderness'
medalList.description: These boundless barrens are where her home is, which is why she will never wander the lands.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Quercus's Operator Record 'Final Moments'
medalList.description: A reviled life, a celebrated death. None of this should ever have been.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Quercus's Operator Record 'The Sprouts of Life'
medalList.description: Though tribulations and pain leave their mark, that is no reason stray from your path. Let decaying branches be broken off for new ones to grow.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Iris's Operator Record 'The Candy House'
medalList.description: May every child who seeks out fairy tales find the faraway Castle of Dreams close at hand.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Chiave's Operator Record 'Masterpiece'
medalList.description: Some think that the playlist loaded on a car's stereo system is the best indicator of the owner's tastes, while others think that's absolute nonsense. Chiave agrees with the former.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock PozÃ«mka's Operator Record 'Fallen Inktrails'
medalList.description: Being pricked by the nib of a pen is not particularly painful, but the inkstain will grow deeper into the healing wound.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Tsukinogi's Operator Record 'An Ordinary Sunset'
medalList.description: An ordinary sunset is not a particularly awe-inspiring scenery, but it is the life we've fought hard for.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Snowsant's Operator Record 'A Dilemma of Values'
medalList.description: Everyone understands the allegory of building a tower from grains of sand, but very few people are actually able to bend down and collect the sand, grain by grain.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Aciddrop's Operator Record 'The Face of a Wall'
medalList.description: A facemask, and a can of spray paint. The graffiti she leaves behind may be easily washed off, but the same cannot be said for the memories left in the hearts of onlookers.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Bison's Operator Record 'A Fulfilling Holiday'
medalList.description: Why not compress all your worries and stress into a soccer ball, and give it a good punt?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Breeze's Operator Record 'Prisoner's Dream'
medalList.description: ...I'd like to thank my assistant, Mr. Counsell, for helping me sort through a considerable amount of info... that day will eventually come... the sun shines, the breeze blows, and thus all things are born. â€“â€“H.A. Cloudlace, Handbook of Traditional Gaulish Folk Medicine, 3rd Edition, translator's foreword

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Shamare's Operator Record 'A Curse Without Words'
medalList.description: She digests pain and sorrow in her own way, using words of malediction to record frank kindness.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock Whislash's Operator Record 'Exclusive Interview'
medalList.description: The knight died before dawn.

An engraved medal embedded with azure crystal, glowing with the light of life.
It carries a truth that the land-dwellers cannot comprehend: All life came from the oceans.

medalList.getMethod: Complete 200 nodes in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor (Regular Operations or Memory Mapping)
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for your untiring efforts to explore the depths.
The Seaborn constantly rebuild their homes. One never sees the same scenery twice.

medalList.getMethod: Complete 2 endings in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor (Regular Operations or Memory Mapping)
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for witnessing two possibilities in the depths.
The divergent thought model of the Seaborn allowed Mizuki to paint two different futures for you to observe. He smiles at the look of surprise on your face.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Raging Billows 20 times in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor (Regular Operations or Memory Mapping)
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for going into the oceans and beginning the exploration of the Seaborn abode.
The dwellings of the Seaborn are beautiful gardens, but you must first find the key to the gate.

medalList.getMethod: Complete 30 Regional Commissions in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for helping with Tulip's problems.
Your efforts have improved conditions for the Iberians, bringing vitality to this dead land. Tulip thanks you for your contributions.

medalList.getMethod: Recruit 40 Operators in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor (Regular Operations or Memory Mapping)
medalList.description:
An engraved medal carved based on Operators' impressions of the ocean depths.
The ocean is vast and deep. It accepts all, human or Seaborn.

medalList.getMethod: Own 100 collectibles in the Biospecimen Display in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for your collection and archiving of biological products.
How will people view the progress of civilization, as they look back on these objects in a thousand years?

medalList.getMethod: Unlock 4 squads in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who've unlocked multiple squad configurations.
Conditions allowing, you've designed a variety of exploration squad configurations that can effectively deal with the various challenges of the ocean depths.

medalList.getMethod: Get 3 contract rewards with different Memory Mappings in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor
medalList.description:
An engraved medal that records the memories of many operators.
No one has unveiled fate. Your knowledge of how the events developed allows you to observe, not interfere.

medalList.getMethod: Reach Lv. 65 in the Ecosequence of Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor
medalList.description:
An engraved medal based on the theme of a self-completing ecosystem.
Humanity extracts resources from nature by destroying it. The Seaborn evolve alongside nature. Perfection should not be a characteristic.

medalList.getMethod: Complete Surging Waves 4 in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for your knowledge of the mysteries of the ocean and the Seaborn.
The ocean has its rules, and the Seaborn are not truly perfect. You know their rules. You shall determine their future.

medalList.getMethod: Win 10 battles with Highmore in Integrated Strategies: Mizuki & Caerula Arbor (Regular Operations or Memory Mapping)
medalList.description:
Naturally engraved medal generated after Highmore accepted her own existence, representing her identity.
Humanity gives sentimental value to objects representing major events that they experienced, calling it a commemoration. Highmore's ownership of the medal indicates that she harbors such sentiments, as humans do.

An engraved medal inlaid with a crimson solitaire, shining with an otherworldly light. 
The performance has come to an end, but looking back, where are the stories that belong to us?

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Clear a total of 200 nodes in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded for your tireless exploration of the castle. 
Your hand-drawn maps have some rooms overlap while others span eerily across several floors. You suddenly realized that perhaps the castle doesn't want its true nature revealed.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Reach 2 endings in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who have experienced the duality of possibilities within the castle. 
There is no hope in the left hand, yet the right is not devoid of despair. This cyclical play is composed by the playwright and the cast, together.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Clear Homeland Remnants 10 times in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who have corrected chronology's flow multiple times. 
You gradually realized that the flow of time here doesn't quite abide by the laws of nature, and after several attempts, you've cracked the temporal trap left by the castle's master.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Obtain a total of 50 plays in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who have assembled a vast collection of plays. 
You've gained a deep understanding of the tools of a playwright. With enough time, why not try your hand at penning your own piece?

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Recruit a total of 40 Operators in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
A commemorative engraved medal based on many operators' impressions of the castle. 
The castle remains, continuing to grow with the collective imagination.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: During the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme, hold a total of 100 Collectibles in the Longevity Box.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who have collected a large amount of the castle's treasures. 
You've gathered enough to open a museum. Unfortunately, many of the items aren't suitable for public display, and are better stored in a warehouse.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Unlock 4 squads in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who've unlocked multiple squad configurations. 
Conditions allowing, you've designed a variety of exploration squad configurations that can effectively deal with the various challenges inside the castle.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Finish 3 Contracts using different monthly squads in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal commemorating the discovery of the story behind the castle's treasures by multiple squads. 
They tell tales that have been covered by dust, they explore possibilities of futures untold.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Level your Castle Notes up to 65 in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal based on the knowledge revealed through the castle notes. 
After splicing together the clues again and again, you found a mark that you've seen before, on Phantom's personal belongings.

medalList.getMethod: Integrated Strategies: Obtain a total of 10 victories using Operator Shalem in the Phantom and Crimson Solitaire theme.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal akin to the badge worn by Shalem during his time with the Crimson Troupe, representing his identity. 
The badges of the failed were cast into the flames where they would die along with their owners. Yet, Shalem still lives, and as has his badgeâ€”a dramatic achievement, in a sense.

medalList.getMethod: Collect 1 furniture set
medalList.description: You collected an entire set of furniture for the first time.

medalList.getMethod: Collect 5 different sets of furniture in total
medalList.description: You collected several sets of furniture.

medalList.getMethod: Collect 10 different sets of furniture in total
medalList.description: You collected ten sets of furniture. Looks like you really enjoy interior decorating.

medalList.getMethod: Collect 15 different sets of furniture in total
medalList.description: You collected a decent amount of furniture sets. Closure looks real happy.

medalList.getMethod: Collect 30 different sets of furniture in total
medalList.description:
You've collected many sets of themed furniture, and the Procurement Department will notify you as soon as new items are available. 
The furniture sets you've purchased greatly improve the ambience of your operators' dorms.
