medalList.getMethod: Produce any formula 1 times in the Factory
medalList.description: Your Factory has begun operations.

medalList.getMethod: Produce any formula 25 times in the Factory
medalList.description: Your Factory's operations are stable.

medalList.getMethod: Produce any formula 100 times in the Factory
medalList.description: Your Factory's operational output is on the rise.

medalList.getMethod: Produce any formula 500 times in the Factory
medalList.description: Your Factory's operational output has been greatly improving.

medalList.getMethod: Produce any formula 1000 times in the Factory
medalList.description:
Your Factory has really taken shape.
Perhaps manufacturing will become one of Rhodes Island's most important sources of income in the future.

medalList.getMethod: Process 1 type of elite material at the Workshop
medalList.description: Your Workshop has begun operations.

medalList.getMethod: Process a total of 5 different types of elite material at the Workshop
medalList.description: Your Workshop's operations are stable.

medalList.getMethod: Process a total of 10 different types of elite material at the Workshop
medalList.description: Your Workshop's operational output is on the rise.

medalList.getMethod: Process a total of 20 different types of elite material at the Workshop
medalList.description: Your Workshop's operational output has been greatly improving.

An engraved medal using the logo of a certain conceptual prototype as a blueprint.
The terminus of the commonplace and outdated, the starting point of a new paradigm.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Base Point.

medalList.medalName: Base Point: Commemorative Contract Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Base Point.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, exchange for the 'Fantastic Crafts' outfit.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal always worn during Operation Base Point. 
There is no better way to get to know a loved one than to understand and support her preferences.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Base Point.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.medalName: Base Point: Call to Arms Medal
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Base Point.

medalList.medalName: Base Point: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Base Point.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Base Point.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Base Point.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Base Point, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Base Point.

You have completed your journey in Yumen.
The wounded city comes to a temporary stop, as travelers set off on their journeys once more, with their newfound answers. It is not yet too late.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow' event, obtain Operator Jieyun.
medalList.description:
You come across an Anasa girl with pure eyes.
She does not understand her master's 'ideals,' but is willing to travel afar for them. Thus, a rock in the wilderness finds itself tumbling into a nomadic city.

medalList.medalName: New Customer At Old Workshop Medal
medalList.getMethod: During the 'Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow' event, consume 4000 Newly-Distilled Liedaozi in [The Swordsmith].
medalList.description:
You witnessed the Sword Forge's craftsmen forge weapons and collected a great number of fine treasures.
Though old friends have departed, new blades must yet be forged, for the jianghu yet remains.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Case Investigation, Onsite] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials and story stages).
medalList.description:
You have successfully locked down the Shanhaizhong that infiltrated the city.
Those who have grown used to the poplars are familiar with every breeze and every grain of sand.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Yumen Arena Board of Fame] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You have made a name for yourself on the long-standing Yumen Arena Board of Fame.
Having your name on the board is like having wine when you are happy; it is merely a compliment to your joy. Every man has a responsibility to defend their homeland.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WB-9 with a 3-star rating and defeat 'Ya' while Delusion is active.
medalList.description:
You have exposed Its background and uncovered Its purpose.
Anger, bewilderment, humiliation... countless subtle emotions fade away in fleeting moments, yet they exist in this ceaseless, eternal moment.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WB-EX-1 with a 3-star rating with at least 3 'Roadblocks' remaining on the battlefield.
medalList.description:
Your contributions to the Patrol Battalion's deployment have been immense, filling all around you with admiration.
There is traditional saying in the Yumen army: 'There are a wealth of young men practicing kung fu in Yumen, and they are not as tall as the wooden stake when they first start practicing.'

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Criminal Pursuit, Offsite] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description: You have finished reading Heroes of Yumen and have discovered the true chaos both within and outside of the story. Turbulent winds and clouds grow old as those who come continue to pursue. Keeping my difficulties quiet, my heart remains steadfast.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WB-EX-3 with a 3-star rating with no more than 1 Shanhaizhong Cipher Machine remaining on the battlefield.
medalList.description:
Your performance before the Yumen army has greatly roused all those in attendance.
Hear the winds beating the drums, the rattling of the sheathes, and the songs of triumph.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WB-EX-4 with a 3-star rating with no more than 2 Shanhaizhong Harbingers having climbed onto the Yumen Catastrophe Defenses.
medalList.description:
You recorded the poem the poet composed in the face of Catastrophe.
'All of Heaven and earth in a flask. That long dream, tragic ere and now.'

You saw a flame burn peacefully.
Whether the path up ahead is treacherous or smooth, everything is now crystal clear.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'What the Firelight Casts' event, obtain Operator Puzzle.
medalList.description:
You have drawn the attention of an intelligence agent.
He is calm and collected in his observations. Only mere moments later, an endless stream of threads and connections have already been pieced together in his mind.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'What the Firelight Casts' event, consume 4000 'Manuscripts of Ballads' in [River Valley Caravan].
medalList.description:
The folksong manuscripts you transcribed follow the caravan's footsteps and are being carried further afield.
You truly believe that one day, they will be brought to more vibrant, thriving lands, where they will again be sung loud and clear.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Swamp In The Mists] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials and story stages).
medalList.description:
You set foot into ruins that have long been forgotten.
The winds howled through the eroded caves, producing a terrifying roar that, to your ears, are like an elegy sung by throats weathered by history.

medalList.getMethod: Clear FC-6 with a 3-star rating without any ignited Reeds
medalList.description:
You went through a night that was shrouded in dense, thick smoke.
As you lift your head up, you see a flame scorching the dark night sky and leaving behind but the blood-colored scar we call 'dawn.'

medalList.getMethod: Clear FC-8 with a 3-star rating with operators deployed in Mire no more than 3 times.
medalList.description:
Your emotions stirred upon hearing her voice.
You find it hard to distinguish whether those words that touched you heart carried hope or ambition.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Search Warrant From the City Council] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
After much pondering, you decided to present the truth.
What lies in the boundary between truth and falsehood is not an impassable chasm, but rather a tiny idea.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Ashes of Memories] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You swept away the shadows that shrouded memories.
She is no longer someone else's shadow.

medalList.getMethod: Clear FC-EX-7 with a 3-star rating with operators deployed in Mire no more than 3 times.
medalList.description:
You carefully followed her and avoided the fatal quagmires.
A slanting beam of sunlight falls upon the murky, frigid mire, igniting a spark of hope in you.

medalList.getMethod: Clear FC-EX-8 with a 3-star rating with at least 3 unignited Reeds.
medalList.description:
After the inferno, you found a patch of land where life yet blooms.
The bitter fruits sown anew have experienced war and exile, yet they remain prepared to break through the soil to see tomorrow's daylight.

You completed your journey at Siracusa.
Remember to visit the graves and offer fresh flowers before you leave.

medalList.getMethod: Give 10 Likes in Critica Artistica during IL Siracusano
medalList.description:
You forget yourself among the operas.
The facade of happiness is fleeting. The truth of pain is eternal.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Vigil during IL Siracusano
medalList.description:
You know the heir of Bellone. Ah, the famiglia formerly known as Bellone.
The wolf cub picks up his father's banner in his mouth and runs towards the moon in his heart, casting away stale and rotten order.

medalList.getMethod: Spend 4000 Import Permits during IL Siracusano
medalList.description:
Supplies that you purchased have filled the famiglia's warehouse.
Fresh ingredients pile up, and the goods furthest in have unusually long expiration dates.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [MenÃ¹ del Banchetto] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You have tried everything on the menu.
The steak's bloody cross-section leaves a deep impression, but the taste is okay overall.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Stagione delle Piogge] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
You witnessed change in Siracusa.
Old thorns buried deep within flesh have been shifted. What lies at the end of the path of briars is yet unknown, yet some continue to tread that path.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Pistole e Ordine] with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You have reached the end of this rain.
A gap opens in the overcast sky. The wind blowing in from the barrens stops in its steps. Passersby look up, waiting for the next rain by habit.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Pistole e Ordine] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You seized the throat of the Lord of the Wilds.
The rules of the game may not be broken.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Terra Desolata Autoproclamata] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You watched the final act of I Siracusani.
Familiar actors leave the stage one by one, and the heavy curtain drops down. A new city awaits the dawn of day.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all tasks for 7 characters during IL Siracusano.
medalList.description:
Your name has become known amongst the famiglie.
Be careful at night.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock all areas in Volsinii during IL Siracusano.
medalList.description:
You cast your gaze over the streets of Volsinii.
Not even the tiniest speck of blood by the sewer entrances escapes your attention.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock limiter units [Reuse Modules], [High-Speed Memory] and [Repel Control].
medalList.description:
Medal created by Closure, developer of the Trials for Navigator.
Real or virtual, she will always be your guide in times of danger.

medalList.getMethod: Complete the Spectacular Trial of TN-4 Clash of Ideologies.
medalList.description:
Medal made in the image of a navigator greeting the rays of dawn on the deck of Rhodes Island.
One trial does not make a navigator, but your fearlessness has impressed everyone.

medalList.getMethod: Unlock limiter units [Maintenance Patch], [Reduction Module] and [Optimize Load].
medalList.description:
A medal personally crafted by the developer of 'Trials for Navigator,' Closure.
No matter what kind of trials you will face, she will always be on your side.

medalList.getMethod: Complete the Spectacular Trial of TN-4 Proud Sun's Shadow.
medalList.description:
A medal made in the image of a navigator pulling an all-nighter in the offices of Rhodes Island.
The contents of the trials are everchanging, and your unmovable persistence fills all around you with great admiration.

Your knowledge of the ins and outs of Zeruertza is on par with the natives.
'You may be a little tall, but it's not like we don't have tall citizens!'

medalList.getMethod: Obtain Minimalist during Ideal City: Endless Carnival.
medalList.description:
You see a new operator being dragged along by Gavial.
He has spent many years in the world of design, but his career as a designer is only just begun.

medalList.getMethod: Spend 4000 Photocopies of 'Stranger Things' in [Leaping Gloompincer Market] during Ideal City: Endless Carnival.
medalList.description:
The overprinted magazine copies almost buried the Leaping Gloompincer Market.
The representatives of Zeruertza secretly discussed whether to make copies of it the official currency of Zeruertza. Fortunately, none of them were drunk at the time.

medalList.getMethod: Complete any 50 missions in [City Forum] and claim the rewards.
medalList.description:
You completed most of the missions at the City Forum.
The Durin have never seen someone so industrious. They would have asked more from you, if they weren't about to evacuate.

medalList.getMethod: Obtain 20 pieces of Self-Driving Cart gear during Ideal City: Endless Carnival.
medalList.description:
You have collected countless pieces of self-driving cart gear.
You are collecting faster than the makers can produce new ones, and meeting your growing needs has become a major challenge for suppliers.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Underground Sightseeing] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
You bore witness to a journey that went beneath the surface, then back to the surface again.
The carnival will continue even at Acahualla. It is hot there, after all.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Cultural Shock] with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You experienced Durin culture, which is very different from life on the surface.
It is not such a bad way of life, but there are few who have chosen to become part of it.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Cultural Shock] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You know the culture and lifestyle of the Durin of Zeruertza like the palm of your hand.
Never forget, however, that Zeruertza is merely one of many Durin city-states.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Elevator Maintenance] on Challenge Mode (except IC-MO-1).
medalList.description:
You ensured that the elevator safely brought the denizens of Zeruertza to Acahualla.
It is no small feat to transport the entire population of a city, especially since almost all of them are Durin.

medalList.getMethod: Complete IC-MO-1 in [Elevator Maintenance] with a 3-star rating.
medalList.description:
You reached the pinnacle of Zeruertza's celebrations.
You've defeated all opponents on the Self-Driver Hell Trail, becoming a legend of Zeruertza.

An engraved medal inspired by the image of those drowning in waves of money.
The last gasps of air that they willingly exhale from their drowning lungs are the final sounds of the waves.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Fake Waves.

medalList.medalName: Fake Waves: Commemorative Contract Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Fake Waves.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: Exchange for outfit 'Afternoon Teatime' in Operation Fake Waves.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded when you obtain a certain outfit in Operation Fake Waves.
New spring, new scenes.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Fake Waves.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.medalName: Fake Waves: Call to Arms Medal
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Fake Waves.

medalList.medalName: Fake Waves: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Fake Waves.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Fake Waves.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Fake Waves.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Fake Waves, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Fake Waves.

An engraved medal based on a foxhole and charred corpse motif.
The impact of war reaches to the bone. There is no place for flesh and blood to hide.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Ashring.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Ashring.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, exchange for the outfit 'Rest Between Sets.'
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded when you obtain a certain outfit.
Good health is the starting point of everything.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Ashring.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Ashring.

medalList.medalName: Ashring: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Ashring.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Ashring.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Ashring.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Ashring, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Ashring.

medalList.medalName: 'You Have to Wake Up in the End'
medalList.description:
You have seen this journey at Trimounts through to the end.
The site is now a ruin due to out-of-control tech, but behind the curtain will forever be an undying force to prop it back up. You need to take care around technology, and be on guard against the powers behind it.

medalList.getMethod: Clear DV-5 with a 3-star rating while defeating at least 1 R-31 Heavy Power Armor.
medalList.description:
You have defeated a new model of never-before-seen weapon.
When something out of the ordinary is discovered, there's usually a complete system in place behind it.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dorothy's Vision' event, obtain Operator Astgenne.
medalList.description:
The first medal Astgenne received upon arriving at Rhodes Island.
If she's determined to break away from something, then she sure will. Life puts shackles on her that defy description, and she can only cut her fetters away and continue on.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dorothy's Vision' event, spend a total of 4,000 Mysterious Reagents at the [Laboratory Recycling Depot].
medalList.description:
You have experienced a day in the life of the typical Rhine Lab worker.
Running up data and getting results are hard enough as is, but your boss always saddles you with unimaginable inspection deadlines. You're lucky not to be crushed with debt, at least.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Data Collection] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You have flawlessly handled all aspects of your work experience.
Rhine personnel tell you that this is the simplest a day gets in their lives, workload included. You have decided to leave this place as soon as you can, to return to the office you know so well.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Test Site] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials, DV-S-1 and DV-S-2).
medalList.description:
You have witnessed the shattering of a wonderful vision.
What broke this beautiful dream was not cruel reality, but the dreamer herself waking up and coming to. She doesn't wish to tie down those she lovesâ€”she wants to send them off to futures further flung.

medalList.getMethod: Clear DV-EX-2 with a 3-star rating while activating at least 3 R-31a Heavy Power Armors.
medalList.description:
You have made it to the pinnacle in your challenge against technology.
Tech ought to be a helping hand in humanity's advance, not a hindrance, but people always seem to love exploiting it for strife.

medalList.getMethod: Clear DV-EX-7 with a 3-star rating without defeating Dorothy.
medalList.description:
You do not consider Dorothy the true enemy by any means.
She founded a dreamland to fulfill her ideals, and destroyed that dreamland to prove her ideals.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Rhine HQ] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You have seen the rainclouds drifting over Trimounts.
At the end of the wilds lies hope and opportunity, along with danger and misfortune.

medalList.getMethod: Clear DV-8 with a 3-star rating, with 'Awaken' defeating no more than 2 friendly Operators with [Journey] while alive.
medalList.description:
You have a staunch will, never perturbed by false visions, no matter how beautiful.
Some might choose to find blessings in falsehood. You have planted your feet in reality and testified to your standpoint.

You have analyzed various information about the Afterglow and come to a decision. 
Those who hide their faces are still preparing to make their move, but your actions have nevertheless saved many innocent lives.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Lingering Echoes' event, deploy Operators in Realigned Flux a total of 200 times.
medalList.description:
You have taken full advantage of the energy emanating from underground. 
The schemers never expected the aging power lines to obstruct their own.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Lingering Echoes' event, obtain Operator Czerny.
medalList.description:
You have provided financial support for an abject musician. 
He understands the preciousness of wealth, but is far more willing to give up everything for someone who understands the value of art.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Lingering Echoes' event, spend 4000 Draft Sheet Music in [Musician's Mailbox].
medalList.description:
You have found a large amount of lost drafts, and have sent them to the musician. 
A new melody is forming within his mind. He decides to gift it to whoever sends the most manuscripts.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Spy Base] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You have sampled every kind of coffee available in the Afterglow. 
For various reasons, the shopkeeper is often away for long periods, but the coffee's taste remains the same.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Afterglow Hall] with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You have witnessed a concert that leaves a lasting impression. 
Please leave the venue quietly and do not disturb the long shadows left on the ground by the sunset.

medalList.getMethod: Clear LE-EX-3 with a 3-star rating, and have 9 Operators in Realigned Flux at the time of victory.
medalList.description:
You have rectified the misconceptions of a few prideful people. 
Do not underestimate percussion instruments. Setting aside the timpani, which is often considered the vice-conductor of the orchestra, the humble triangle comes with its own wealth of techniques.

medalList.getMethod: Clear LE-EX-7 with a 3-star rating, and have none of Dame Gertrude's Virtual Images on the field at the time of victory.
medalList.description:
You have precisely identified the opponent's tactics and swiftly defeated them. 
Talent is important, but daily practice and patience are just as much so.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Back Alleys] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You know the alleyways of the Afterglow like the back of your hand. 
The sunset will not stay forever, and the long night will inevitably come to an end.

medalList.getMethod: Clear LE-8 with a 3-star rating, and have no more than 3 Operators leave the field during 'Lamentation of Nothingness.'
medalList.description:
You have withstood the pressure that comes with the roar of the past. 
Not many can stand unflinching in the face of the nothingness that threatens to consume all meaning, but you are one of those few.

An engraved medal made to capture the impression of the ocean waves crashing upon the coast.
The tides forever ebb and flood in a never-ending cycle. This is the sea's silence and the sea's roar.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Deepness.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Deepness.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, obtain Operator Erato.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal proving your recruitment of an Operator during Operation Deepness.
Her harp serenades the beauty of the lands, while her bow protects it all. The two complement one another.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Deepness.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Deepness.

medalList.medalName: Deepness: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Deepness.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Deepness.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Deepness.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Deepness, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Deepness.

You have completed your journey at Gran Faro.
The waves yet beat against the rocks on the shore. This brief moment of tranquil will not be the end, yet there will always be someone standing watch here like a lighthouse. As long as a ray of light still shines, the eternal night will never arrive.

medalList.getMethod: Activate all of 'Little Handy's' components.
medalList.description:
You have a firm grasp of many technologies from the past.
Technology and the future go hand in hand with one another, but sometimes you can learn something new by looking at the past.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Stultifera Navis' event, obtain Operator Lumen.
medalList.description:
A medal that Thiago awarded Jordi many years ago.
When he received this commendation for getting the church sparkling clean, he never would have imagined that he would one day shine light upon Iberia's seas.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Stultifera Navis' event, spend a total of 4,000 Rusted Compasses at [Bitterscale Tavern].
medalList.description:
Your spending power has left a deep impression on the townsfolk here.
Iberian souvenirs may seem cheap to foreign visitors, but this would perhaps have been unimaginable before the Profound Silence.

medalList.medalName: Treasures of the Raging Seas Medal
medalList.getMethod: Obtain all Treasure Chest rewards on the map.
medalList.description:
You found many lost treasures.
Perhaps these treasures never belonged to anyone to begin with, and the ocean bestows them upon those who have its approval.

medalList.getMethod: Clear all story stages with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
You witnessed the sinking of the Stultifera Navis.
The destination of a ship is not necessarily a port. It could be an ideal instead.
It was the final witness to a glorious age, and in turn, you are its.

medalList.getMethod: Clear SN-EX-5 with a 3-star rating while equipping at most three 'Little Handy' components.
medalList.description:
You used a small number of tools to excellent advantage.
Putting tools to good use is not the same as being dependent on them, a fact often forgotten throughout the course of civilization.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Dusty Picturebook] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You laid down judgment on the invaders from the seas.
This is a world built atop the principle of natural selection.
Having proven yourself the stronger, you have earned the right to lay down judgment.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Mirror Image] with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You set foot on the beach after the tides have ebbed.
At the end of the billowing waves, will we find dry, arid lands or a calm sea?

medalList.getMethod: Clear SN-EX-8 with a 3-star rating while equipping at most three 'Little Handy' components.
medalList.description:
You defeated your adversary under extremely perilous conditions.
Man created tools to make up for his weakness, yet you chose to set them aside to prove your strength.
Simply claiming victory is not enough. Perhaps this is what you truly wanted instead?

You have visited, and left Laterano.
That this holy city has never collapsed amidst crisis is owed to its faith, just as you have always held firm to your own beliefs. Your gait ceases not, so where's the harm in being astray?

medalList.getMethod: Clear GA-7 after defeating the Pathfinder Nuncio.
medalList.description:
You have had a deep discussion with the Pathfinders.
They question, they quest. They are the lost, yet so too the steady seekers of the way.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Guide Ahead' event, obtain Operator Enforcer.
medalList.description:
A handmade medal gifted to Ezell by the Notarial Hall's seasoned ranks.
The moment he began to follow his own heart, unfettered by what had set in as common sense, was when he qualified as a true executor.

medalList.getMethod: During the â€˜Guide Ahead' event, spend a total of 2,400 Etched Bullet Casings at [Lateranian Desserts].
medalList.description:
You have let the money flow during the Summit of Nations.
The Nuncios have informed you that every guest at the conference will be received with courtesy, and that you may enjoy your time in Laterano without worrying about expenditures. You've taken the chance to thoroughly appreciate this holy city.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Notarial Tasks] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You have perfectly handled a great number of affairs during the Summit of Nations.
Transfer of relics, upholding order... Your experiences as a Notarial Hall executor have been far from interesting, and whether you can keep it up hinges on how committed you are to 'the faith and the law.'

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Summit of Nations] with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You have finally voiced the doubts buried deep in your heart, and found an answer.
In truth, you didn't need anyone's reply. You needed only to ask the question: in asking, you more truly interrogated yourself. About what you hear and believe, about what you gain and lose, about the path you've walked and your way forward.

medalList.getMethod: Clear GA-EX-2 with a 3-star rating without enemies (Pathfinder Ballistarii Prefect) using 'Gelato Stop' to replenish ammo.
medalList.description:
You have borne witness to multiple counts of demolition on Laterano's streets.
Within the scope permitted by the commandments and the code, every Lateran has the right to satisfy their curiosity, including by demolition of buildings... You've needed some mental gymnastics to comprehend this.

medalList.getMethod: Clear GA-EX-5 with a 3-star rating, and control 2 'Gelato Stops' at time of victory.
medalList.description:
You have taken in a series of events from Iberia's past.
He ran a long, long way, ultimately coming against a tremendous wall. He wanted to know why this towering wall was erected here, and so heartlessly.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [The Road to the Shrine] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You have heard the bells of the Tower of Revelations.
'The bells echoed throughout the wilderness, uniting all the Sankta.' But you know it was someone up there singing a folksong, one that transcended time, one of parting.

medalList.getMethod: Clear GA-EX-7 with a 3-star rating, and control 3 'Gelato Stops' at time of victory.
medalList.description:
You have obtained all usage rights for the 'Gelato Stops.'
Laterano's desserts have you reluctant to leave. Law makes this city stronger, and dessert makes it truer.

An engraved medal fashioned after the torch that burned alone in the wilderness, enduring and bright.
The way is far and the night is long. Stand no vain vigil for dawn at hand; light instead the path ahead, and be swift through the starry dark.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Dawnseeker.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Dawnseeker.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, exchange for the outfit 'Glen Sonata'
medalList.description:
An engraved medal bundled with an outfit obtained from Operation Dawnseeker.
Adventure is a lonely undertaking, and music is the ultimate pastime. Don't show too much surprise at Asbestos's musical tastes, now.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Dawnseeker.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Dawnseeker.

medalList.medalName: Dawnseeker: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Dawnseeker.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Dawnseeker.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Dawnseeker.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Dawnseeker, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Dawnseeker.

You've managed to find the owner of the goblet. 
What is inherent to us, as well as to the fate of this land, are unanswerable questions by nature. Anger is useless, fear is unnecessary, so we might as well drink, sing, and keep our minds and hearts open.

medalList.getMethod: Clear IW-4 while defeating at least 15 Wooden Waregeists (including Grindstone, Vernacularism, and Inkwave).
medalList.description:
You are already familiar with Shancheng's unique geography. 
As the saying goes, you've walked the 'Trials of Shu's Paths'. Cableways and tunnels connect the mountains, and the mountains are integrated into the city. Highs and lows intertwine like a maze, yet the Shangshu people never get lost. And you have already become half Shangshu yourself.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Invitation to Wine' event, obtain Operator Kroos the Keen Glint.
medalList.description: 'Once you raise your crossbow, the only things left swimming in your eyes are your sight and your target. But before you pull the trigger, there's so much you've got to think about.' The crossbow is not only a weapon, and the relationship between the tip of the bolt and the target is much more complicated. To contemplate this means that you have grown.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Invitation to Wine' event, spend a total of 2,400 Canned Tea at [Xingyu Inn].
medalList.description:
You are generous when paying for tea and wine. 
The scenery in Shangshu differs from any other. With time to spare, you can climb mountains and marvel at the boulders. Without, you can enjoy tea and sample wine. You are extravagant and carefree, and have become well acquainted with the various shopkeepers.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Escort Duty] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You've left your footprints across the peaks of Shangshu. 
The old shops at the foot of the mountains, the porters coming and going, the timeless pavilions, the new wines, and the countless legends of the ancients scattered throughout the mountains will always live on.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Tales of Three-Mountains] with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
The incidents you've encountered in Shangshu have all subsided. 
But beyond Shangshu, the trend continues. It is impossible for you to stay on the sidelines, so you might as well buy some wine first.

medalList.getMethod: Clear IW-EX-4 while defeating at least 5 Porcelain Waregeists (Scarletmist).
medalList.description:
You've imbibed several jugs of Husong wine without getting drunk. 
This wine is a Shangshu specialty, different from Jiangnan's light wine and Saibei's strong wine in that its flavor lingers longer. You are a decent drinker, and those cups that seem to fly in and prance away are no drunkard's illusion.

medalList.getMethod: Clear IW-EX-6 while defeating at least 5 Metal Waregeists (Including Sharpedge, Scantwords).
medalList.description:
You've brought new changes to Shancheng's time-honored brand. 
Escort businesses, guest inns... There are always things that have withstood the tides of societal change. But rules are destroyed and birthed anew in an endless cycle. Whether they are now broken or still standing is not always an easy question to answer.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Mountain Top] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You've reached the summit spoken of in legends. 
When you stood atop the eighteenth peak of Shangshu which was said to not exist, only then did you realize the legendary Catastrophe actually occurred. Every saying, every legend, is but another of the city's masks. Though a mask may change one's appearance, flesh and blood lies just underneathâ€”and that itself is a form of truth.

medalList.getMethod: Clear IW-EX-8 with a 3-star rating while defeating no more than 50 Wisps.
medalList.description:
You finally faced Sui-Xiang. 
All those roars that you heard spanning the millennia may have been anger, fear, or, in the end, nothing more than your own obsessions.

You stopped the avalanche. 
The winter sunlight pours across the land of Kjerag, laughter fills the air, and everything seems to be developing in a better direction. However, as you know well, the snow will continue to fall, and avalanches... will happen again and again.

medalList.getMethod: Clear BI-8 with a 3-star rating before the second blizzard arrives.
medalList.description:
You are a true master of snowfield combat tactics. 
The purpose of training each TschÃ¤ggÃ¤ttÃ¤ team was to realize your goals. And obviously, you still have some energy left.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Break the Ice' event, obtain Operator Kjera.
medalList.description:
You have gained Her favor. 
God does not exist, but God also does exist. When She looks across Her dominion, not a soul knows whether She will be proud or bewildered.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Break the Ice' event, spend a total of 2,400 Stones of Kjeragandr at [Turicam Trade Zone].
medalList.description:
You've become a VIP of the Karlan Trade Company. 
Even without being personal friends with Enciodes, the vast amount of money you spent at the Kjerag Exchange is enough to get premium suites at Karlan. You might even consider trying to compete with Enciodes, which may not be a bad option either.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Kjerag Guidebook] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You've walked the streets and alleyways of Kjerag. 
You've discovered that modern technology has gradually spread through this small country, and perhaps by your next visit, the entire country will be transformed. Whether that's a good or a bad thing, you can't say for sure.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [The Grand Ceremony] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
Your trip to Kjerag took an unexpected turn. 
Or perhaps, that was what you expected all along?

medalList.getMethod: Clear BI-5 after making at least 3 Icefield Arts Fighter fall.
medalList.description:
You've learned some tricks from the hunters who live in isolation in the mountains. 
Snow conceals many thingsâ€”conspiracies, bloodstains, and of course... traps.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Holy Hunt] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
Your prestige has spread to every corner of Kjerag. 
The people believe that none are worthier to serve as Enciodes's right hand than you, and as both you and Enciodes know, you both are looking forward to your next contest.

medalList.getMethod: Clear BI-EX-8 after defeating Degenbrecher.
medalList.description:
You succeeded in containing Degenbrecher. 
An army of one holds ten-thousand at the pass. You should be thankful that she isn't your enemy after all.

medalList.getMethod: Clear BI-EX-2 after making at least 10 enemies fall.
medalList.description:
Your ability to toy with your prey upon the snowfield is an artform. 
Under your guidance, they may even believe that they chose to walk into your trap, and that you are a mere bystander.

An engraved medal based on the cast of a legendary artist's seal. 
The people of this world know only the history of the pieces stamped with this seal, but are nary interested in the deeper meaning behind it.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Pine Soot.

medalList.medalName: Pine Soot: Commemorative Contract Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Pine Soot. 
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, exchange for the outfit 'Healing Hand, Evil Heart.'
medalList.description:
An engraved medal that was bundled with the outfit obtained from Operation Pine Soot. 
As the saying goes, you don't reach out to slap the face of a smiling man. If you want medical attention from Aak, you'd do well to watch your manners.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Pine Soot. 
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.medalName: Pine Soot: Call to Arms Medal
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Pine Soot.

medalList.medalName: Pine Soot: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Pine Soot. 
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Pine Soot.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Pine Soot.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Pine Soot, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Pine Soot.

You witnessed one knight seize triumph twice, but this time, she left her laurels on the podium. 
At the end of the long night, the sun rises over the horizon. Before it sets, her blazing light will spread across the entire land.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Near Light' event, obtain Operator Wild Mane.
medalList.description:
A badge Iwona designed for herself back when she was still a competition knight. 
The reason most people remember her badge is not for its actual design, but rather its golden luster.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Near Light' event, complete all Long-Term Goals for all factions in 'Your Desk.'
medalList.description:
You experienced the 'leisure' life of a Kazimierzian public official. 
For all that is holy, you're grateful that the tasks they assigned you were limited in scope, and that you didn't have to attend any meetings.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Near Light' event, spend a total of 20 Agenda Proposals when completing Daily Tasks in 'Your Desk.'
medalList.description:
You poured a tremendous amount of effort in securing the support of various organizations. 
Amazed by your business prowess, career bureaucrats are ready to weave your feats into management textbooks.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Near Light' event, raise your Prestige with any of the three major factions to [Respected].
medalList.description:
You've reached an agreement with Kazimierz's leadership. 
As you know, the maintenance of this relationship is completely dependent on the principles of consistent mutual benefit and profit maximization.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Near Light' event, spend a total of 2,400 G.K.T. Commemorative Models at 'Trade Exhibition.'
medalList.description:
You've spent some time at Kazimierz's Trade Exhibition. 
Here, the merchandise is not only duty free, but many special discounts are available during the event. As attractive an opportunity as this is for buyers, companies are more than glad for the opportunity to dump their wares.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in 'Kawalerielki' with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
You witnessed a champion of the Kazimierz Major being crowned again. 
As usual, the 24th Major Championship Medal Set will be released for a limited time only and will soon enter the market, becoming another hot piece in the medal collection scene.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in 'Area 0' with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You've experienced the fulfilling life of a Red Wine reporter. 
Writing a report is like cooking a dish - it depends not only on the raw ingredients, but also on whether the master's craftsmanship is pure.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in 'Area 0' on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You've learned the tricks of the trade to being an entertainment reporter. 
The headlines should be huge, the photos should be blurry. The content should be funky, and the text should be brief.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in 'City Neon' with 3-star ratings.
medalList.description:
You've visited the Alliance's main locations. 
Though the Grand Knight Territory boasts few formal military units, the individual combat abilities of these knights still impress you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in 'City Neon' on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You've participated in an invitational tournament co-hosted by the Alliance. 
Few people can beat these pros under the competition's rules, and regardless of the outcome, they're the ones who always stand to reap the benefits.

An engraved medal based on a wild beast's scales.
One can only imagine how many have found themselves ensnared by the beauty of this lone wild scale.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Wild Scales.

medalList.medalName: Wild Scales: Commemorative Contract Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Wild Scales.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, exchange for the outfit 'Casual Vacation HD31.'
medalList.description:
An engraved medal comes with the outfit in Operation Wild Scales.
Trust me! She really is just here to do first aid!

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Wild Scales.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.medalName: Wild Scales: Call to Arms Medal
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Wild Scales.

medalList.medalName: Wild Scales: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Wild Scales.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Wild Scales.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Wild Scales.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Wild Scales, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Wild Scales.

Entertainment is everything!
Enjoy yourself with all you've got. That's the meaning of life!

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dossoles Holiday' event, obtain Operator Tequila.
medalList.description:
A badge that Pancho always kept on him; it is now Ernesto's.
Although what the badge once stood for has long ceased to be, Ernesto continues to keep it on him at all times. We shall never know whether this is meant to be a keepsake or a way for him to reflect on himself.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dossoles Holiday' event, complete all of [Ch'en's Clue Note]'s content.
medalList.description:
You now know what Ch'en has been up to aside from participating in the competition while she is on holiday in Dossoles.
This has been a terrible holiday to her. Well, maybe not as bad as she's making it sound.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dossoles Holiday' event, collect all [Honors Showcase] photographs.
medalList.description:
Thank you for your contributions you have made to the promotion of Dossoles's cityscapes.
The Lungmenites have really taken spotlight here. Perhaps you should take a few more photos with them while they're around.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dossoles Holiday' event, spend 4,000 Mama John's Vouchers at [Mama John's].
medalList.description:
You have had quite the shopping spree at Mama John's.
The merchandise you purchased will be delivered to your hotel in Dossoles. May I assist you any other way?

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Dossoles Warrior Champion] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
You have witnessed Team LUNG wRATh's taking the gold in the competition.
Although much of the prize money has been withheld to make up for all the sunk boats, the remainder of the money should still be enough for the team to enjoy the rest of their time in Dossoles.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Afterwinds] with 3-star ratings
medalList.description:
You have begun to really 'understand' what Dossoles stands for. It is a city full of 'opportunities.'
If you make a name for yourself here, someone is bound to knock on your door. Taking care of the trouble will get you even more famous. What a vicious cycle.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Afterwinds] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You have certainly found your place here in Dossoles.
The only way to break this cycle is by proving that you are strong enough, and you have done it.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all Special Investigation stages in [Tidings Unseen] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
Ch'en and the gang battled it out with the delinquents that fled to Dossoles.
Oni and Tiger Twinned Stars; Mouse's Courage, Dragon's Might.

medalList.getMethod: Complete DH-MO-1 in [Tidings Unseen] with a 3-star rating
medalList.description:
With the help of Rhodes Island's field operators, Ch'en and her friends captured a group of diehard remnants of Pancho's gang.
From here on out, the L.G.D.'s name will forever hang over the heads of all Dossoles criminals.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dossoles Holiday' event, collect all Stickers
medalList.description:
Ch'en and Lin YÃ¼hsia can now claim to be big Dossoles collectors.
Of course, as everyone knows, most people become so-called collectors when they have nothing better to do. That's how it usually goes in Dossoles, at least.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Dossoles Holiday' event, obtain 5 gifts from Ernesto at recycling
medalList.description:
Unfortunate, or just bored. Ch'en and Lin YÃ¼hsia may have to pick one of these titles for themselves.
Ernesto spent all night forging this medal. The look on his face when he handed Ch'en the medal revealed that not even he could have foreseen this outcome.

An engraved medal based on the coat of arms of a certain knight family.
Its champion has finally fallen silent, and the knight follows suit.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Spectrum.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Spectrum.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, exchange for the outfit 'Shoal Beat.'
medalList.description:
An engraved medal comes with the outfit in Operation Spectrum.
Are you ready to get moving?

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Spectrum.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Spectrum.

medalList.medalName: Spectrum: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Spectrum.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Spectrum.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site.
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Spectrum.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Spectrum, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Spectrum.

You spent a few days in this deceased city.
To be able to leave was already fortuitous. Are you sure you want to return?

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Under Tides' event, activate Emergency Aid Buildings a total of 50 times (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
You worked hard to restart emergency aid buildings throughout the city.
Is it too late? Nobody knows.

medalList.medalName: 'Three Hunters Are Walking on Seacoast Way'
medalList.getMethod: During the 'Under Tides' event, obtain Operator Gladiia.
medalList.description:
You heard their song.
Should Gladiia not will it, even the most sophisticated recording equipment cannot capture these special vibrations.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'Under Tides' event, spend a total of 2,400 Corrupted Iberian Records at the [Barter].
medalList.description:
You collected a large number of records from the ruins.
They cannot fill your belly nor can they make a sound, but music still fills your head.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Try to Survive] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You endured hunger that most cannot bear.
This may allow you to hold on a bit longer, but you'll still need to find food as quickly as possible.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Deserted Salviento] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
You've caught a glimpse of the shadows flowing beneath the tide.
It is but the tip of the iceberg. Your sanity has so far withstood this test.

medalList.getMethod: Clear SV-EX-6 with a 3-star rating while activating Emergency Aid Buildings no more than 1 time.
medalList.description:
You faced claws and fangs that do not exist upon this land.
You've learned that emergency facilities can temporarily relieve the pain wracking your brain, but you are hesitant to rely on it.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Choppy Ruin] on Challenge Mode.
medalList.description:
You have already given enough.
The challenges that lie ahead may defy your wildest imagination. Pray that you will survive until the very end.

medalList.getMethod: Clear SV-EX-7 with a 3-star rating without activating an Emergency Aid Building.
medalList.description:
You've discovered the unexpected temptation of giving up.
The utility of the emergency facilities is declining. Is that because they are changing, or is it because of you?

medalList.getMethod: Clear SV-9 with a 3-star rating while activating Emergency Aid Buildings no more than 1 time.
medalList.description:
You fully understood the appeal of those words.
Your nerves have been thrashed raw, but your spirit remains indomitable. Finally, you have realized that it is not technology that can sway a believer, but rather the conviction of a soul that believes in itself.

You have witnessed a very small portion of her tortuous journey.
Inscribed within her eyes are a great land and an entire epoch. Just as we cannot condense the rise and fall of civilizations in a single word, we scarcely have the words to describe her.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'A Walk in the Dust' event, destroy a total of 50 Air Support Drones (includes Scrap, Scrap Model-U, Anvil, and Anvil Model-B, tutorial stages do not count).
medalList.description:
You cleverly handled the mercenary offensive.
Similar three-dimensional warfare solutions are expensive, and many mercenary companies find that annual drone expenditures are their most pressing problem.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'A Walk in the Dust' event, obtain Operator Heavyrain.
medalList.description:
Heavyrain is coming.
Though she may look like a weak and timid girl, the weapon in her hand will sometimes move faster than her thoughts.

medalList.getMethod: During the 'A Walk in the Dust' event, spend at least 2,400 Scattered Sketches in the Reefsteep Black Market.
medalList.description:
You've carefully sorted out old files for a certain operator. Will she thank you?
The knowledge and lost images within may not be the most memorable, but even through these fragments, you can feel a hint of a lonely romance and a noble mission.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Song of Dust] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You've heard many anecdotes about her.
She's getting closer to becoming a flesh-and-blood 'human.' Only this way can she find her final destination.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Walk Alone] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials).
medalList.description:
You've watched her travel down many paths.
These are but small threads in the lengthy tapestry of civilization.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WD-EX-6 with a 3-star rating while destroying at least 8 Air Support Drones (includes Scrap, Scrap Model-U, Anvil, and Anvil Model-B).
medalList.description:
You've displayed excellence in neutralizing enemy drones.
Mercenaries hate fighting those who insist on shooting down their drones more than anything else. It gets too expensive.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [The Endless Road] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You watched over her, and she watched over the land.
In this lifetime, she tried repeatedly to prevent humans from ushering in their own ruination. But her power is too diffuse, and she requires true followers.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WD-EX-5 with a 3-star rating without destroying any Air Support Drones (includes Scrap, Scrap Model-U, Anvil, and Anvil Model-B).
medalList.description:
You've recovered a fair number of air support drones.
'Why break 'em? Think about how much money we save by waiting for them to run out of fuel, then picking 'em up.'

medalList.getMethod: Clear WD-8 with at least a 3-star rating while being hit by [Collapsing Fear] in [Dominion] no more than 4 times.
medalList.description:
You tried your hardest to avoid getting entangled in foreign affairs.
The Dominion of Demons has long been a fanciful notion, having nothing to do the traces of any existing civilization, its principles inscrutable to any Arts or scientific research. However, it is by no means the only unknown existence in this world. After all, what do the civilizations of Terra have to show for all their development?

You sensed through to Dusk's field of view.
Once, she said she was merely a habitant of a painting. Perhaps she truly landed her guess. But she doesn't plan on doing anything about it. What about you, then?

medalList.getMethod: During the event, deploy allied units on Marks of Hui and Ming a total of 150 times.
medalList.description:
You made your first delve into Dusk's way of the painting.
The next time you meet, she'll bring you aesthetics from a place far above logic.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Leave From Yourself] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
From that home in a memory, you departed.
This place's customs, clothing and buildings were wholly unlike the nomadic cities of Yan in style. Was it someone's faint recollection of their hometown, or a phantasmagoria brought about by the wielder of a brush?

medalList.getMethod: Clear WR-10 with a 3-star rating while using [Two-Step Firecracker mk2] less than 4 times
medalList.description:
You avoided all possible excess reliance on Nian's items. This is very wise.
Heaven knows what's inside one of these two-step firecrackers, but it's not a normal Originium explosive at any rate. There's never anything wrong with using a little care.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WR-EX-6 with a 3-star rating while deploying Roadblocks less than 8 times
medalList.description:
You used appropriate obstructions to put the Ink Spirits to the test.
It has to be said, if some of the Ink Spirits truly existed in reality, it'd be a chance to change up the presently high-risk, high-barred state of the Originium Slug pet market.

medalList.getMethod: Clear WR-EX-8 with a 3-star rating without destroying [Free]'s shield [Break the Chains]
medalList.description:
You turned a blind eye as it broke its own shackles. This was your mercy.
'Free' had never been truly free to be before, and had actually rarely experienced situations like this. For a moment, it even sympathized with you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Come To Yourself] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You prevailed over formidable musings.
The name 'Ink Spirit' was one Saga chose. Before that, they all actually had their own names. Er, some of them were pretty adorableâ€”did Dusk really pick them out? That immovable object?

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in [Ask Yourself] and collect the rewards.
medalList.description:
You traveled the landscapes of Dusk's scrolls, just as Saga did.
The fact Saga escaped by herself is something Dusk has taken to heart even now. After all, Saga's far too young a being. Doesn't it come off as degrading of Dusk's standing?

medalList.getMethod: During the event, obtain Operator Lava the Purgatory.
medalList.description:
You bore witness to an Operator's future.
Lava's already greatly grown, and become quite maturely steady, but she still revels in her additionally earned title of 'Purgatory,' despite it seeming a little redundant at that point.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, consume 2400 Dusk Inkstones in [Answer Yourself].
medalList.description:
You collected a great deal of Dusk's beloved objects.
There's just one tiny little concern. Can you really take what you brought out of Dusk's scrolls, and throw them into a workshop rest assured?

An engraved medal based upon a certain lead seal.
No matter how deep into the abyss the secrets are hidden, they will surely all emerge into the world someday.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.medalName: Lead Seal: Commemorative Contract Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Lead Seal.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, obtain Operator Tuye
medalList.description:
An engraved medal proving your recruitment of an Operator during Operation Lead Seal.
The deserts of Sargon are vast and endless, yet Tuye will always find her way back.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Lead Seal.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles, making effective use of the terrain.

medalList.medalName: Lead Seal: Call to Arms Medal
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.medalName: Lead Seal: Call to Arms Medal II
medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, complete 8 Challenge Contracts at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who acted decisively during Operation Lead Seal.
You have proven your ability to respond to various emergencies.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, unlock 4 Rank-3 Contracts for the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who crossed many battlefields during Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, reach a rating of S at any Rotating operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who approached their missions with careful deliberation during Operation Lead Seal.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Lead Seal, use Friend Support to clear stages at any operation site no fewer than 5 times
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who helped each other during Operation Lead Seal.

You understand everything that this prison break stands for.
When even rules can be bent because of the circumstances, what should we remain steadfast for?

medalList.getMethod: During the event, imprison prisoners a total of 50 times
medalList.description:
You have built a reputation among the prisoners.
Your exquisite combat skills have even reached Warden Barton's ears, resulting in the bestowal of this medal.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, obtain Operator Robin
medalList.description:
You have assisted a girl who is lost about the future.
It is hard to say she had almost fallen into the wrong path. The other path open to her may not be one full of missteps, though it is certainly not faultless either.

medalList.getMethod: During the event, consume 2400 Factory Steel in [Secret Channel]
medalList.description:
You have amassed a large amount of resources via the prisoners' special channels.
You have no idea where they obtained these resources, and you have no idea what their uses are inside the prison.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all the content in 'Be Prepared!' and collect the rewards
medalList.description:
You have finished plotting out your prison break.
During the process, Mina discovered this medal by chance. It seems to be the warden's go-to gift for the dignitaries who visit the prison.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Escape Plan] with 3-star ratings (excluding tutorials)
medalList.description:
You have successfully assisted Anthony's escape from the prison.
Though smog looms in the air outside, the air here also signifies freedom. This is where it all begins.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MB-EX-1 with a 3-star rating with at least 4 Imprisonment Devices remaining
medalList.description:
You have ensured the functionality of the majority of the devices here.
You have also discovered that certain models of these devices bear the Rhine Lab mark.

medalList.getMethod: Complete all stages in [Mansfield Daily Life] on Challenge Mode
medalList.description:
You have grown accustomed to the clashes between prisoners here. You are even enjoying it to some degree.
Perhaps Anthony should hand his position over to you.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MB-8 with a 3-star rating with at least 4 Imprisonment Devices remaining
medalList.description:
Much of the prisoners have surrendered to your 'power.'
The crystallization of technology and wisdom is not something that can be resisted with mere might.

medalList.getMethod: Complete MB-EX-8 with 3 stars, with at least 2 Imprisonment Devices remaining
medalList.description:
You have overcome the adverse circumstances by taking advantage of your surroundings.
Evidently, when we find ourselves unable to take on a problem with our strength alone, we must make up for it with our smarts. Brains and brawn, both complementing one another in perfect harmony.

A medal engraved based on the personal seal of a Catastrophe Messenger.
All in the name of saving even more lives.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, reach a rating of S in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who faced adversity during Operation Cinder.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, reach a rating of SSS in the Permanent operation site
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who conquered desperation during Operation Cinder.
You have overcome many challenges.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, purchase Bagpipe's outfit - Queen, No. 1
medalList.description:
An engraved medal that was bundled with a casual outfit obtained from Operation Cinder.
Even race cars give way to Bagpipe out of respect.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, complete all rotating challenges (including daily Challenge Contracts and clearing Contingency 8) and collect the rewards for a total of 10 days.
medalList.description:
An engraved medal awarded to those who stood on the front lines during Operation Cinder.
You have proven your ability to command high-intensity battles in unfamiliar terrain.

medalList.getMethod: During Operation Cinder, complete 1 Challenge Contract at the Permanent operation site and collect the rewards
medalList.description: An engraved medal awarded to those who responded to the shifting demands of Operation Cinder.

medalList.medalName: Cinder: Call to Arms Medal II
